translated: Likewise, cognition is not a part of the external object, because it is the apprehender. This is the absence of the pervasion.

original: de ltar na ni 'o na yod pa'i don 'dzin pa tshad ma yin la cig shos ni tshad ma ma yin pa de ltar na tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa'i rnam par dbye ba grub pa yin no //

translated: If that is so, then the cognition that apprehends an existent object is valid knowledge, and the other is not valid knowledge. In that case, the distinction between valid knowledge and non-valid knowledge is established.

original: yod pa'i don 'dzin pa'i shes pa ni don grub pa'i rgyu mtshan yin la /
analyzed: yod pa'i don 'dzin pa'i shes pa ni don grub pa'i rgyu mtshan yin la /
translated: The cognition that apprehends an existent object is the reason for establishing the object.

original: yod pa'i don 'jal bar byed pa'i dngos po'i rgyu mtshan can yang tshad ma'i sgra yin no zhe na /
analyzed: yod pa'i don 'jal bar byed pa'i dngos po'i rgyu mtshan can yang tshad ma'i sgra yin no zhe na /
translated: The word valid knowledge also has the reason of apprehending an existent object.

original: rnam par dbye ba grub pa ni bden na shes pa'i yod pa'i don 'dzin pa ni mngon par 'dod pa'i rgyu mtshan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba grub pa ni bden na shes pa'i yod pa'i don 'dzin pa ni mngon par 'dod pa'i rgyu mtshan ni ma yin no //
translated: If the distinction is established, it is true that the cognition that apprehends an existent object is not the reason for the desired object.

original: gal te des don yod pa bzung du bcug pa di lta na yang /
analyzed: gal te des don yod pa bzung du bcug pa di lta na yang /
translated: Even if it causes the apprehension of an existent object,

original: 'bras bu sgrub pa'i rgyu ni don de nyid yin gyi de 'dzin pa'i shes pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu sgrub pa'i rgyu ni don de nyid yin gyi de 'dzin pa'i shes pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The cause of the establishment of the effect is the object itself, not the consciousness apprehending it.

original: gal te ma bzung na ni mi 'thob la //
analyzed: gal te ma bzung na ni mi 'thob la //
translated: If it were not apprehended, it would not be obtained.

original: ma thob na ni 'dod pa'i 'bras bu'i yan lag ma yin pa des na bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par rung ba thob par byed pa'i sgo nas don thob par byed pa yin pa'i phyir don bya ba'i yan lag yin la /
analyzed: ma thob na ni 'dod pa'i 'bras bu'i yan lag ma yin pa des na bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par rung ba thob par byed pa'i sgo nas don thob par byed pa yin pa'i phyir don bya ba'i yan lag yin la /
translated: If it were not obtained, it would not be a factor of the desired effect. Therefore, since it causes the obtainment of the object by causing the obtainment of what is suitable to be established, it is a factor of the object to be accomplished.

original: thob par byed pa de yang 'dzin pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: thob par byed pa de yang 'dzin pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: And that which causes obtainment is preceded by apprehension.

original: gal te de lta na ni shes pa'i don bya ba thob par byed pa nyid don grub pa'i yan lag yin la /
analyzed: gal te de lta na ni shes pa'i don bya ba thob par byed pa nyid don grub pa'i yan lag yin la /
translated: If that is so, then the cause of the establishment of the object of consciousness is the factor of the establishment of the effect.

original: yod pa'i don 'dzin pa ni thabs yin par 'gyur ro //üîΩgang kho na las don du gnyer ba rnams kyis 'bras bu'i yan @203a * //
analyzed: yod pa'i don 'dzin pa ni thabs yin par 'gyur ro // gang kho na las don du gnyer ba rnams kyis 'bras bu'i yan @203a * //
translated: And the apprehension of an existent object would be the means.

original: lag gi rang bzhin du bstan pa de nyid tshad ma'i sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan brtag par 'os pa yin na /
analyzed: lag gi rang bzhin du bstan pa de nyid tshad ma'i sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan brtag par 'os pa yin na /
translated: That which is taught as having the nature of a factor of the effect by those who seek it is itself worthy of being examined as the reason for the application of the term valid cognition.

original: thabs 'di ni nges pa ma yin te /
analyzed: thabs 'di ni nges pa ma yin te /
translated: This method is not certain,

original: gang gi phyir rjes su dpag pas zhen pas kyang don thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rjes su dpag pas zhen pas kyang don thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because even one who is attached to inference obtains the object.

analyzed: gang zhig gang gis nges pa'i thabs ma yin pa de ni don du gnyer bas nges par bstan par bya ba ma yin gyi /
translated: That which is not a certain method for someone is not to be taught by one who seeks that.

original: dper na me don du gnyer bas me shel bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na me don du gnyer bas me shel bzhin no //
translated: For example, one who seeks fire does not seek a sunstone.

original: don 'dzin pa yang don thob par byed pa'i nges pa'i thabs nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: don 'dzin pa yang don thob par byed pa'i nges pa'i thabs nyid ma yin no //
translated: Also, the apprehension of the object is not a certain method for obtaining the object.

original: de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa de don du gnyer bas yongs su 'dzin pa ni de'i thabs kyi dngos po tsam la ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa de don du gnyer bas yongs su 'dzin pa ni de'i thabs kyi dngos po tsam la ltos pa yin no //
translated: One who seeks that which is not its nature does not accept it, but it is merely in dependence on the thing that is the method for that.

original: thabs gang yin pa de yang de la yod pa yin te /
analyzed: thabs gang yin pa de yang de la yod pa yin te /
translated: And that which is the method exists for that,

original: gzhan du na de tsam la ltos pa zhes bya ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na de tsam la ltos pa zhes bya ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: otherwise it would not be called merely in dependence on that.

original: des na bsten par bya ba nges pa la thabs nges pas khyab pa yin pa'i phyir khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: des na bsten par bya ba nges pa la thabs nges pas khyab pa yin pa'i phyir khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, because certainty in the method is pervaded by certainty in the object to be relied upon, there is nonobservation of a pervader.

original: de'i phyir don 'dzin pa ni don byed pa'i yan lag gi rang bzhin ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir don 'dzin pa ni don byed pa'i yan lag gi rang bzhin ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the apprehension of the object is not the nature of the component that performs the function.

original: 'on kyang don thob par byed pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang don thob par byed pa nyid yin no //
translated: But rather, it is the means of attaining the object.

original: de'i thabs nges pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i thabs nges pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And the means is not ascertained,

analyzed: de'i phyir don byed pa don du gnyer ba bstan par bya ba ma yin pa na brtag par 'os pa ma yin pa tshad ma'i sgra'i rgyur ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: so how can the object that is not to be taught, which is not worthy of being investigated, be the cause of the word that is a valid cognition?

original: de lta na 'o na ni mi slu ba ni tshad ma'i sgra'i rten du 'gyur la /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na ni mi slu ba ni tshad ma'i sgra'i rten du 'gyur la /
translated: If that is so, then non-deception would be the basis of the word that is a valid cognition,

original: de yang don byed pa thob par byed pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de yang don byed pa thob par byed pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: and that is the nature of attaining the object that performs the function.

original: gal te yang don bya ba dngos po dang 'brel pa de lta na yang don grub par nus pa'i dngos po thob par byed pa'i phyir de thob par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te yang don bya ba dngos po dang 'brel pa de lta na yang don grub par nus pa'i dngos po thob par byed pa'i phyir de thob par byed pa yin no //
translated: Even if the object to be attained is related to the thing, it is still the means of attaining the thing that is capable of accomplishing the object.

original: gal te de lta na yang tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa'i rnam par dbye ba med par mi 'gyur ram /
analyzed: gal te de lta na yang tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa'i rnam par dbye ba med par mi 'gyur ram /
translated: But if that is so, wouldn't there be no distinction between valid cognition and invalid cognition?

original: gang gi phyir shes pa 'ga' zhig las zhugs pa ni 'ga' yang mi 'thob pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir shes pa 'ga' zhig las zhugs pa ni 'ga' yang mi 'thob pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because it is not the case that one does not obtain some object by engaging in some cognition.

analyzed: gang gi phyir chu'i shes pas smig rgyu dang / skra shad kyi shes pas snang ba'i rdul phra rab la zhugs pa na smig rgyu tsam dang snang ba tsam yang mi 'thob pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Because when one engages in the cognition of water with respect to a mirage, and in the cognition of a hair net with respect to a particle of light, one does not fail to obtain a mere mirage and a mere particle of light.

original: de'i phyir rnam grangs 'dis ni shes pa thams cad don bya ba thob pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pas tshad mar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam grangs 'dis ni shes pa thams cad don bya ba thob pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pas tshad mar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Therefore, by this method, all cognitions are valid cognitions because they are the reason for obtaining the object to be attained.

original: bshad pa / don de byed pa la mi slu ba'i don de thob par byed par brjod do //
analyzed: bshad pa / don de byed pa la mi slu ba'i don de thob par byed par brjod do //
translated: NƒÅgƒÅrjuna responds: It is said that it is nondeceptive with regard to the object to be attained.

analyzed: sngar rtogs par byas pa de kho na ltar thob par byed pa ni 'jig rten na mi slu @203b bar brjod kyi thob par byed pa tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: In the world, that which causes one to attain an object just as it was previously understood is said to be nondeceptive, not just that which causes one to attain.

original: 'di ltar don gang ji ltar bstan pa de de ltar thob par byed pa ni mi slu bar brjod do //
analyzed: 'di ltar don gang ji ltar bstan pa de de ltar thob par byed pa ni mi slu bar brjod do //
translated: Thus, that which causes one to attain an object just as it was indicated is said to be nondeceptive.

original: shes pa yang don gang ji ltar bstan pa de ltar thob par byed pa ni mi slu bar 'dod do //
analyzed: shes pa yang don gang ji ltar bstan pa de ltar thob par byed pa ni mi slu bar 'dod do //
translated: Also, a cognition is asserted to be nondeceptive in the sense that it obtains its object in accordance with how it is indicated.

original: des na don byed par rung bar shes pa gang zhig shes pa'i don de thob par byed pa'i sgo nas shes par byed pa'i bya ba la ltos pa shes par byas pa'i dngos po'i yul can ni don byed pa de thob par byed pa mi slu ba yin
analyzed: des na don byed par rung bar shes pa gang zhig shes pa'i don de thob par byed pa'i sgo nas shes par byed pa'i bya ba la ltos pa shes par byas pa'i dngos po'i yul can ni don byed pa de thob par byed pa mi slu ba yin
translated: Therefore, any cognition that is suitable to perform a function is a nondeceptive cognition in the sense that it obtains the object that is indicated by the cognition in dependence on the action of indicating the object.

original: no // mi slu ba nyid 'jig rten na grags pa'i don gzung ba yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: no // mi slu ba nyid 'jig rten na grags pa'i don gzung ba yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: It is not only that the meaning of nondeceptive is taken to be the meaning of valid knowledge in the world.

analyzed: tshad ma'i sgra'i don ni mi slu ba yin pa yang 'dzin pa nyid do //
translated: It is also that the meaning of the term valid knowledge is taken to be nondeceptive.

analyzed: 'di ltar thob par bya ba'i don ston par byed pa mi slu ba'i skyes bu la ni tshad ma zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: Thus a nondeceptive person who indicates the object to be obtained is called a valid knower.

original: 'jig rten na yang gang zhig gi ngag yongs su gcod par byed pa'i dngos por rtogs pa yongs su gcod pa la mi slu ba can du gyur pa yongs su gcod par byed pa yongs su gcad pa la mi slu ba can de la ni tshad ma'i sgra
analyzed: 'jig rten na yang gang zhig gi ngag yongs su gcod par byed pa'i dngos por rtogs pa yongs su gcod pa la mi slu ba can du gyur pa yongs su gcod par byed pa yongs su gcad pa la mi slu ba can de la ni tshad ma'i sgra
translated: In the world, that which is a means of ascertaining something is called a means of valid knowledge pramƒÅ·πáa, and that which is ascertained is called an object of valid knowledge pramƒÅ·πáa.

analyzed: des na gzhal ba la mi slu ba'i shes pa la 'jal bar byed pa nyid du ni 'jig rten pa nyid las grub pa yin no // spyir bshad pa /
translated: Thus, the world itself establishes that a consciousness is a means of valid knowledge pramƒÅ·πáa when it is nondeceptive with regard to the object it perceives.

analyzed: grags pa'i khyad par la brten pa'i sgra ni mthong ba yin te /
translated: In general, the word pramƒÅ·πáa is seen to be used in the sense of a means of ascertaining something.

original: dper na rdza ma byed pa la 'jug par bshad pa ni rdza mkhan gyi sgra rigs kyi khyad par la 'jig pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rdza ma byed pa la 'jug par bshad pa ni rdza mkhan gyi sgra rigs kyi khyad par la 'jig pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, the word potter is used in the sense of one who makes pots.

original: de bzhin du 'jal bar byed pa la bshad pa'i tshad ma'i sgra 'di ni gzhal ba la mi slu ba nyid kyi khyad par la grags pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'jal bar byed pa la bshad pa'i tshad ma'i sgra 'di ni gzhal ba la mi slu ba nyid kyi khyad par la grags pa yin no //
translated: Similarly, the word pramƒÅ·πáa, which is explained as a means of ascertaining something, is used in the sense of that which is nondeceptive with regard to the object it perceives.

original: de nyid kyi phyir tshad ma'i sgra yang dag pa'i shes pa'i rnam grangs su ston par mdzad pa na /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir tshad ma'i sgra yang dag pa'i shes pa'i rnam grangs su ston par mdzad pa na /
translated: Therefore, when he taught that the term valid cognition is a synonym of correct consciousness,

analyzed: de bstan pa'i phyir tshad ma rnam gnyis kho na zhes dam bcas pa dang / tshad ma slu med can shes pa // zhes kyang gsungs so //
translated: in order to demonstrate that, he stated the thesis ‚ÄúValid cognition is only of two types‚Äù and also said,üîΩ‚ÄúValid cognition is nondeceptive consciousness.‚Äù

translated: One must accept that it is nondeceptive in obtaining the object that is the object of activity of the consciousness that has the reason of the activity of the agent.

analyzed: gzhan du na de yod na 'bras bu thob pas mi slu ba de tshad ma yin pa'i phyir /

analyzed: lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / byed pa'i tshogs dang / thob par byed pa'i sa gzhi la sogs pa yang thob pa'i rgyu mtshan yin te /
translated: The hand, the foot, the collection of organs, and the ground that is the place of obtaining would also be the reason for obtaining.

original: de dag med na thob par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag med na thob par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if they did not exist, obtaining would not be tenable.

original: des na thams cad tshad mar thal lo //

translated: Therefore it follows that everything would be valid cognition.

original: 'jal bar byed @204a * //
analyzed: 'jal bar byed @204a * //

analyzed: pa nyid med pa'i phyir thal bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if it is not a valid cognition, then it is not a valid cognition.

translated: That is not so, because when you assert that it is a nondeceptive means of obtaining the object that is the evaluated entity, then at that time, if it is not an apprehender, then since the object that is obtained by the qualifier does not exist,

analyzed: tshad mar thal bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it follows that it is not a valid cognition.

analyzed: don thob par byed pa tsam mi slu ba'i rgyu mtshan yin na ni dper na rnam pa 'ga' zhig ltar /
translated: If the mere nondeceptive means of obtaining the object is the reason, then, like some aspects,

analyzed: na med la sogs pa'i sgra bzhin du tshad ma'i sgra bshad pa'i rgyu mtshan la mi ltos par thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: it would apply to everything, without regard to the reason for the explanation of the term valid cognition, like the words ‚Äúnonexistent‚Äù and so on.

analyzed: da lta ni gzhal ba'i dngos po'i bsgrub par bya ba'i 'bras bu'i thob pa'i rgyu mtshan tshad ma yin pa'i phyir shes pa nyid do //

translated: Since the reason for obtaining it is that it is to be relied upon by one who seeks the object, it is to be understood from the treatise, not from something else.

analyzed: thob pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid du ni khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /

analyzed: phyi rol gyi dngos po de yod pa tsam gyis ni don du gnyer ba 'ba' zhig gi 'dod pa grub pa'i rgyu ma yin te /

analyzed: don du gnyer ba'i 'jug pa yang shes pa'i khyad par gyi rab tu gzhag pa'i yul yod na thob pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no //
translated: The engagement of the one who desires is the cause of obtaining when there is an existent object that is established by a specific cognition.

original: srog chags kyi yan lag dang 'dod pa la sogs pa ni shes pas nye bar gzhag pa'i yul de nyid la 'jug par rtsom pa na shes pa dang 'brel pa nyid do //
analyzed: srog chags kyi yan lag dang 'dod pa la sogs pa ni shes pas nye bar gzhag pa'i yul de nyid la 'jug par rtsom pa na shes pa dang 'brel pa nyid do //
translated: The limbs of living beings, such as the desire, etc., are the object of engagement when one begins to engage in that very object that is established by cognition, and they are related to cognition.

original: des na 'jug pa'i yul rab tu 'jog par byed pas shes pa ni gtso bo'i rgyu yin la /
analyzed: des na 'jug pa'i yul rab tu 'jog par byed pas shes pa ni gtso bo'i rgyu yin la /
translated: Therefore, since it establishes the object of engagement, cognition is the primary cause.

original: rgyu mtshan gzhan shes pa dang 'brel pas 'jug par byed pa shes pa dang 'brel pas 'jug pa de'i @204b gzhan gyi dbang du gyur ba ni gtso bo ma yin pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gzhan shes pa dang 'brel pas 'jug par byed pa shes pa dang 'brel pas 'jug pa de'i @204b gzhan gyi dbang du gyur ba ni gtso bo ma yin pa yin no //
translated: Because it is related to another, i.e., to the cognition, it is engaged, and it is not the principal one, since it is dependent on another.

original: de'i phyir 'jug pa'i yul nye bar 'jog pas gtso bo'i rgyur gyur pa'i shes pa nyid don byed pa thob bar byed pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'jug pa'i yul nye bar 'jog pas gtso bo'i rgyur gyur pa'i shes pa nyid don byed pa thob bar byed pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since it is the object of engagement, cognition alone, which is the principal cause, is the one that obtains the result of the function, and not the other.

original: de nyid kyi phyir tshad ma don thob pa'i rgyu mtshan yin yang shes pa kho na tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir tshad ma don thob pa'i rgyu mtshan yin yang shes pa kho na tshad ma yin no //
translated: Thus, although valid knowledge is the reason for obtaining the result, cognition alone is valid knowledge.

original: de med par mi thob pa'i phyir tshad ma ni 'jug pa'i 'bras bu can du brjod la /
analyzed: de med par mi thob pa'i phyir tshad ma ni 'jug pa'i 'bras bu can du brjod la /
translated: Since it is not obtained in the absence of that, valid knowledge is said to have engagement as its result.

original: de la yang shes pa gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yang shes pa gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And since cognition is the principal factor in that,

original: de'i phyir 'jug pa'i rgyu gzhan ni shes pa'i gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'jug pa'i rgyu gzhan ni shes pa'i gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa yin no //
translated: therefore, the other cause of engagement is dependent on cognition.

original: gang gi phyir don med pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa skyes pa na yang des gzhag pa'i yul la 'jug pa rtsom pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir don med pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa skyes pa na yang des gzhag pa'i yul la 'jug pa rtsom pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because even when a consciousness apprehending a nonexistent object arises, it engages the object that it posits.

original: gal te gzhan gyi dbang ma yin na don med pa'i yul la ci'i phyir 'jug par byed //
analyzed: gal te gzhan gyi dbang ma yin na don med pa'i yul la ci'i phyir 'jug par byed //
translated: If it were not dependent on something else, why would it engage a nonexistent object?

original: rnam par shes pa ni de ltar de'i rgyu mtshan dang 'brel pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni de ltar de'i rgyu mtshan dang 'brel pa ma yin te /
translated: Consciousness is not related to its object in that way.

original: des na 'jug pa la rang dbang can yin no //
analyzed: des na 'jug pa la rang dbang can yin no //
translated: Therefore it is independent in engaging its object.

original: de'i phyir 'jug pa'i gtso bo'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'jug pa'i gtso bo'i rgyu yin no //
translated: Therefore it is the primary cause of engagement.

original: thun mong ma yin pa'i yang phyir te /
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa'i yang phyir te /
translated: Also because it is not shared.

original: gang gi phyir rgyu mtshan gzhan rnams ni 'jug pa tha dad pa dang mthun pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rgyu mtshan gzhan rnams ni 'jug pa tha dad pa dang mthun pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Other reasons are not compatible with different engagements.

original: 'on kyang shes pa nyid yin no //üîΩ'di snyam du rgyu gzhan dag la yang 'jug pa so so la /
analyzed: 'on kyang shes pa nyid yin no // 'di snyam du rgyu gzhan dag la yang 'jug pa so so la /
translated: However, it is consciousness itself.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid tha dad pa yod pa des na thun mong ma yin pa nyid do snyam na de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid tha dad pa yod pa des na thun mong ma yin pa nyid do snyam na de ni mi rigs te /
translated: If you think that other causes also have different intrinsic characteristics for each engagement, therefore they are not shared, that is illogical.

original: 'gar yang rang gi mtshan nyid tha dad pa med pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gar yang rang gi mtshan nyid tha dad pa med pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not that they are never without a difference in their intrinsic identity.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid la tha dad yod kyang mang po rnams kyi thun mong du byed pa dgag par ni mi nus te /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid la tha dad yod kyang mang po rnams kyi thun mong du byed pa dgag par ni mi nus te /
translated: Even though there is a difference in their intrinsic identity, it is impossible to deny that many things perform a common function.

original: tshad mas grub pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad mas grub pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is established by valid cognition.

original: de byed pas de las gzhan dag las ldog pa rnam pa gcig tu 'dzin par 'jug pa'i rgyur gyur pa gcig nyid du nges pa ni tha mi dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de byed pas de las gzhan dag las ldog pa rnam pa gcig tu 'dzin par 'jug pa'i rgyur gyur pa gcig nyid du nges pa ni tha mi dad pa ma yin no //
translated: Since it performs that function, it is the cause for engaging in the apprehension of the singularity that is the exclusion of other things.

original: tha snyad 'di yul med pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: tha snyad 'di yul med pa yang ma yin te /
translated: This is not a non-existent object.

original: yod pa ni don byed pa'i rgyu mtshan can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa ni don byed pa'i rgyu mtshan can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because existence is characterized by the performance of a function.

original: tha snyad 'di ni tshogs pa'i yin la /
analyzed: tha snyad 'di ni tshogs pa'i yin la /
translated: This convention is of a collection,

original: tshogs pa yang med pa yin no zhes kyang bsam par mi bya ste /
analyzed: tshogs pa yang med pa yin no zhes kyang bsam par mi bya ste /
translated: but it should not be thought that the collection does not exist.

original: gang gi phyir gcig tu brtags pa'i tshogs pa dngos por ma gyur mod /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gcig tu brtags pa'i tshogs pa dngos por ma gyur mod /
translated: Because although the collection that is imputed as one does not become a thing,

original: du ma'i bdag nyid kyi dngos po dngos po med par ji ltar 'gyur du ma gang ji snyed pa de thams cad dngos po med pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: du ma'i bdag nyid kyi dngos po dngos po med par ji ltar 'gyur du ma gang ji snyed pa de thams cad dngos po med pa ni ma yin te /
translated: How could a thing that has a manifold nature become a non-thing? Not all manifold things are non-things,

original: ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro //üîΩrgyu dang 'bras bu dag gi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog @205a * //
analyzed: ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro // rgyu dang 'bras bu dag gi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog @205a * //
translated: because that would lead to absurd consequences.

original: pa'i rjes su byed pa nyid kyang 'di lta bur gyur pa'i yul can kho nar brjod do //
analyzed: pa'i rjes su byed pa nyid kyang 'di lta bur gyur pa'i yul can kho nar brjod do //
translated: The fact that the cause and effect are related as antecedent and consequence is also stated only in terms of a subject that is of this sort.

original: de'i phyir ji ltar don byed pa nyid kyis yod pa nyid yin pa de bzhin du khyad par can gyi don byed pa nyid kyi khyad par can gyi yod pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir ji ltar don byed pa nyid kyis yod pa nyid yin pa de bzhin du khyad par can gyi don byed pa nyid kyi khyad par can gyi yod pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, just as something is existent by virtue of its causal efficiency, in the same way, it is qualified as existent by virtue of its causal efficiency.

original: ji srid du de byed pa yongs su rdzogs pa de thams cad ni gcig pa yin no //
analyzed: ji srid du de byed pa yongs su rdzogs pa de thams cad ni gcig pa yin no //
translated: And as long as its causal efficiency is complete, it is all one.

original: de la gcig tu ngo shes pa'i yul gyi don rnams tha dad pa yin na yang don byed pa 'ga' zhig rtogs nas chu'i tha snyad rten pa'i yod pa'i khyad par du rnam par gzhag pa'i chu'i don byed pa de ni myu gu'i rang bzhin thams cad laüîΩkhyad par med do //
analyzed: de la gcig tu ngo shes pa'i yul gyi don rnams tha dad pa yin na yang don byed pa 'ga' zhig rtogs nas chu'i tha snyad rten pa'i yod pa'i khyad par du rnam par gzhag pa'i chu'i don byed pa de ni myu gu'i rang bzhin thams cad la khyad par med do //
translated: Although the objects of the cognition of water are different, the causal capacity of water, which is posited as the particular existent that is the basis of the convention ‚Äúwater,‚Äù is not different from the nature of the sprout.

original: khyad par can gyi myu gu byed pa nyid chu'i yod pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan ni ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par can gyi myu gu byed pa nyid chu'i yod pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan ni ma yin te /
translated: The causal capacity of the sprout is not the reason for the convention ‚Äúexistence of water.‚Äù

original: ha cang thal pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ha cang thal pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that would be absurd.

original: de'i phyir chu la sogs pa khyad par med kyang myu gu'i khyad par ni sa bon las yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir chu la sogs pa khyad par med kyang myu gu'i khyad par ni sa bon las yin no //
translated: Therefore, although water and so on are not different, the difference of the sprout is from the seed.

original: des na de ni myu gu'i thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: des na de ni myu gu'i thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: Therefore, the seed is the unique cause of the sprout.

original: des na ji ltar gal ta don grub pa'i thabs mang po yod pa de lta na yang me nyid thun mong ma yin pa'i thabs yin pa'i phyir de'i don nyid la 'jug go //
analyzed: des na ji ltar gal ta don grub pa'i thabs mang po yod pa de lta na yang me nyid thun mong ma yin pa'i thabs yin pa'i phyir de'i don nyid la 'jug go //
translated: Thus, just as there are many means of accomplishing a purpose, so too, because fire is the unique means, one engages in the purpose of that.

original: de bzhin du gal te don grub pa'i thabs thob pa'i rgyu mang po yod pa de lta na yang 'jug pa'i yul gyi khyad par 'jig par byed pas tha dad par byed pa nyid ni thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir dang / rang dbang can yin pa'i phyir gtso bo'i rgyu ni shes pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du gal te don grub pa'i thabs thob pa'i rgyu mang po yod pa de lta na yang 'jug pa'i yul gyi khyad par 'jig par byed pas tha dad par byed pa nyid ni thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir dang / rang dbang can yin pa'i phyir gtso bo'i rgyu ni shes pa yin no //
translated: Likewise, even though there are many causes for the attainment of the means of accomplishing the object, the primary cause is cognition, because it is the uncommon cause that makes the difference in the object of engagement, and because it is independent.

original: thob pa de yang des 'tsho ba yin pa'i phyir tshad ma'i ming can brtag par 'os pa ni de nyid yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: thob pa de yang des 'tsho ba yin pa'i phyir tshad ma'i ming can brtag par 'os pa ni de nyid yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: And that attainment is also the livelihood of that person, so it is that alone, and not anything else, that is worthy of being examined under the name of pramƒÅ·πáa.

original: shes par rab tu gzhag pa'i 'jug pa'i yul de yang gang yin zhe na shes pas zhe na par byed pa'i don gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: shes par rab tu gzhag pa'i 'jug pa'i yul de yang gang yin zhe na shes pas zhe na par byed pa'i don gang yin pa ste /
translated: What, then, is that object of engagement that is posited as cognition? It is the object that is desired by cognition,

original: gang gi phyir de la ni don du gnyer bar 'gyur na skyes bu 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de la ni don du gnyer bar 'gyur na skyes bu 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because a person engages in it out of desire for that object.

original: 'di ltar shes pa'i don ni ma bzung yang shes pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi 'jug pa'i yul du gyur pa shes pa'i 'jug pa'i yul du brjod do //
analyzed: 'di ltar shes pa'i don ni ma bzung yang shes pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi 'jug pa'i yul du gyur pa shes pa'i 'jug pa'i yul du brjod do //
translated: Thus, although the object is not grasped, it is said to be the object of engagement of consciousness, which is the basis of the reason for consciousness.

original: des na gang gang gi zhen pa de ni de'i 'jug pa'i yul yin pa de'i thob par byed pa ni de yin te /
analyzed: des na gang gang gi zhen pa de ni de'i 'jug pa'i yul yin pa de'i thob par byed pa ni de yin te /
translated: Therefore, whatever is the object of engagement of a consciousness is the object of attainment of that consciousness.

original: ma nges na ni mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma nges na ni mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is not ascertained, it is not engaged.

original: 'di ltar shes pa ni don byed pa'i thabs skyed pas thob par byed pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar shes pa ni don byed pa'i thabs skyed pas thob par byed pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Thus, consciousness does not attain its object by generating a means of accomplishing its object.

original: 'on kyang 'di la 'jug par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'di la 'jug par byed pa yin la /
translated: However, it engages its object.

original: skyes bu rang nyid 'gro mi nus pa lag pa nas @205b bzung nas 'jug par byed pa yang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: skyes bu rang nyid 'gro mi nus pa lag pa nas @205b bzung nas 'jug par byed pa yang ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that a person who cannot walk by himself is engaged by grasping his hand.

original: 'on kyang 'jug pa'i yul ma shes par 'jug par mi nus pa la yul nye bar ston par byas pas so //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'jug pa'i yul ma shes par 'jug par mi nus pa la yul nye bar ston par byas pas so //
translated: However, he is engaged by showing him the object of engagement when he is unable to engage it without knowing it.

original: don bstan pa yang lhag par zhen par byas pa yin no //
analyzed: don bstan pa yang lhag par zhen par byas pa yin no //
translated: The object is shown to him and he is made to apprehend it.

original: de'i phyir don gang kho na la 'jug pa de ni shes pas nges pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir don gang kho na la 'jug pa de ni shes pas nges pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, the object of engagement of a consciousness is ascertained by that consciousness.

original: nges par byed pa yang de'i 'jug par byed pa nyid de /
analyzed: nges par byed pa yang de'i 'jug par byed pa nyid de /
translated: And ascertainment is its instigation,

original: de nyid kyis 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyis 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is instigated by that itself.

original: des na tshad ma nges pa'i 'bras bu can du brjod do //
analyzed: des na tshad ma nges pa'i 'bras bu can du brjod do //
translated: Therefore, a valid cognition is said to have ascertainment as its result.

original: 'di'i 'jug par byed pa'i bya ba ni nges par byed pa nyid do zhes bstan pa'i phyir ma rtogs pa'i yul can tshad mar bshad de //
analyzed: 'di'i 'jug par byed pa'i bya ba ni nges par byed pa nyid do zhes bstan pa'i phyir ma rtogs pa'i yul can tshad mar bshad de //
translated: In order to show that the activity of instigation is ascertainment itself, a valid cognition is explained to have non-comprehension as its object.

original: 'di ltar gal te 'jug par byed pa'i bya ba nges pa las tha dad pa yin na ni gcig gis rtogs pa'i don de la gzhan gyis bcug nas thob la 'jug pa'i thob par byed pa de nyid kyang tshad ma yin pa'i phyir rtogs pa'i yul can yang
analyzed: 'di ltar gal te 'jug par byed pa'i bya ba nges pa las tha dad pa yin na ni gcig gis rtogs pa'i don de la gzhan gyis bcug nas thob la 'jug pa'i thob par byed pa de nyid kyang tshad ma yin pa'i phyir rtogs pa'i yul can yang
translated: Thus, if the activity of instigation were different from ascertainment, then when one person comprehends an object, another person could instigate it and that instigation would be valid cognition, so the one who comprehends would also have a valid cognition.

original: 'gyur ro // rtogs par byed pa tsam 'jug par byed pa yin na ni gang gis dngos po de rtogs par byed pa de nyid kyis 'jug pa'i yul de la skyes bu de tsam gyis 'jug par 'gyur bas thob par byed pa'i tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gyur ro // rtogs par byed pa tsam 'jug par byed pa yin na ni gang gis dngos po de rtogs par byed pa de nyid kyis 'jug pa'i yul de la skyes bu de tsam gyis 'jug par 'gyur bas thob par byed pa'i tshad ma yin no //
translated: If it is the mere instigation of understanding that is the instigation, then the valid cognition is the instigation of the person to that object which is instigated by that very means by which that thing is understood.

original: gzhan la ni snga na med pa'i thob par byed pa med pas tshad ma ma yin no //üîΩma nges na ni thabs gzhan med pa'i phyir 'jug par byed pa ma yin la 'jug pa'i yul ma yin pa yang thob par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan la ni snga na med pa'i thob par byed pa med pas tshad ma ma yin no // ma nges na ni thabs gzhan med pa'i phyir 'jug par byed pa ma yin la 'jug pa'i yul ma yin pa yang thob par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: But if it is not the instigation, then it is not a valid cognition, because there is no instigation of the person to the object which is not understood.

original: thabs gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thabs gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is not ascertained, then it is not the instigation, because there is no other means. And if it is not the object of instigation, then it is not the instigation, because there is no other means.

original: des na mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag 'jug pa'i yul nges par byas pa'i thob par byed pa yin pa'i phyir khyad par med pa'i dngos po'i yul can tshad ma zhes bshad do //
analyzed: des na mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag 'jug pa'i yul nges par byas pa'i thob par byed pa yin pa'i phyir khyad par med pa'i dngos po'i yul can tshad ma zhes bshad do //
translated: Therefore, since direct perception and inference are the instigation of the person to the object which is ascertained by the instigation, they are explained as valid cognitions whose objects are things that are not ascertained.

original: ma nges na ni mngon sum gyis de snang ba'i sgo nas bzung du zin kyang mngon sum gyi tshad mas rnam par mi gzhag ste /
analyzed: ma nges na ni mngon sum gyis de snang ba'i sgo nas bzung du zin kyang mngon sum gyi tshad mas rnam par mi gzhag ste /
translated: If it is not ascertained, then even though it is apprehended by the perception through the appearance of that object, it is not established by the valid knowledge of perception.

original: ma nges pa ni 'jug pa'i yul ma yin pa nyid kyis thob par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma nges pa ni 'jug pa'i yul ma yin pa nyid kyis thob par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that which is not ascertained cannot be obtained by being the object of engagement.

original: des na don 'dzin pa la ltos na ni tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: des na don 'dzin pa la ltos na ni tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, in dependence on the apprehension of the object, it is not valid knowledge,

original: de tsam ni don thob par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩtshad ma'i 'jug pa'i yul thob par bya ba ni nges par @206a * //
analyzed: de tsam ni don thob par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir ro // tshad ma'i 'jug pa'i yul thob par bya ba ni nges par @206a * //
translated: because that alone is not a factor that causes the attainment of the object.

original: byas pa'i don nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: byas pa'i don nyid yin gyi /
translated: The object of the engagement of valid knowledge is the attainment of the object, which is ascertained.

original: gzung ba tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzung ba tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not merely apprehended.

original: 'di ltar mngon sum skad cig gang yul du byas pa de nyid thob par byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar mngon sum skad cig gang yul du byas pa de nyid thob par byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Thus, the object that is made the object of a moment of perception is not what is attained.

original: don gang rgyun du 'jug pa khyad par can gyi 'bras bu la nye bar sbyor ba de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa dag las ldog pa mngon sum gyi stobs kyis skyes pa'i nges pas gcig tu yul du byas pa de thob par byed pas yul de tsam
analyzed: don gang rgyun du 'jug pa khyad par can gyi 'bras bu la nye bar sbyor ba de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa dag las ldog pa mngon sum gyi stobs kyis skyes pa'i nges pas gcig tu yul du byas pa de thob par byed pas yul de tsam
translated: The object of a valid cognition is that which is ascertained by the power of direct perception as being the object of a single cognition, and which is the object of a cognition that is produced by the exclusion of all that is not an object that is conducive to the result of a stream-enterer.

original: la tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: la tshad ma yin no //
translated: A valid cognition is just that much.

original: zhen par byas pa 'jug pa'i yul la ltos nas tshad ma yin na ni gcig kyang du ma'i yul du 'gyur te /
analyzed: zhen par byas pa 'jug pa'i yul la ltos nas tshad ma yin na ni gcig kyang du ma'i yul du 'gyur te /
translated: If a valid cognition were a valid cognition in relation to the object of engagement that is conceived, then even a single cognition would have many objects.

original: dper na sgra de nyid ni mngon sum gyis grub po //
analyzed: dper na sgra de nyid ni mngon sum gyis grub po //
translated: For example, sound is established by direct perception.

original: byas pa nyid ni rjes su dpag pa yin la 'di mi rtag pa nyid kyang rjes su dpag pa gzhan gyis so //
analyzed: byas pa nyid ni rjes su dpag pa yin la 'di mi rtag pa nyid kyang rjes su dpag pa gzhan gyis so //
translated: Its being produced is established by inference, and its impermanence is also established by another inference.

original: gzhan du sgra mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ma bzung ba'i cha med pas tshad ma gzhan gyi yul du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du sgra mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ma bzung ba'i cha med pas tshad ma gzhan gyi yul du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, because sound is the object of direct perception, it would not be the object of another valid cognition, since it would not have any part that is not apprehended.

original: don du ma yang chad ma gcig gi yul yin te /
analyzed: don du ma yang chad ma gcig gi yul yin te /
translated: And many objects are the object of a single cognition.

analyzed: de dag las bdag gi 'dod pa 'di la 'byung ngo zhes ni mi sems so //
translated: One does not think, ‚ÄúMy desire arises from that one.‚ÄùüîΩTherefore, because one does not grasp a different nature, one desires to take the indeterminate.

original: de'i phyir rang bzhin tha dad pa ma bzung ba'i phyir nges pa med par blang bar 'dod pa 'bras bu gcig byed pa nye bar mkho ba ma nges par zhen par byas pa 'jug pa gcig gi yul ni mang po yul ni mang po yang tshad ma gcigüîΩgis bzung ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang bzhin tha dad pa ma bzung ba'i phyir nges pa med par blang bar 'dod pa 'bras bu gcig byed pa nye bar mkho ba ma nges par zhen par byas pa 'jug pa gcig gi yul ni mang po yul ni mang po yang tshad ma gcig gis bzung ba yin no //
translated: The object of a single engagement is many, but it is grasped by a single valid cognition.

original: tha dad par ma bzung ba'i phyir ni ma nges par len par 'dod la /
analyzed: tha dad par ma bzung ba'i phyir ni ma nges par len par 'dod la /
translated: Because one does not grasp it as different, one desires to take it as indeterminate.

original: des na nye bar mkho ba ma nges so //
analyzed: des na nye bar mkho ba ma nges so //
translated: Therefore, the requirement is indeterminate.

original: de'i phyir 'jug pa gcig gi yul yin pa des na mang po rnams tshad @208a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'jug pa gcig gi yul yin pa des na mang po rnams tshad @208a * //
translated: Therefore, because they are the object of a single engagement, many are measured by one.üîΩ

original: ma gcig gi yul du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma gcig gi yul du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the many are the object of a single valid cognition, because they are the object of a single cognition.

original: mngon sum gyis mthong ba'i skad gcig rnams la tshul 'di yin gyi /
analyzed: mngon sum gyis mthong ba'i skad gcig rnams la tshul 'di yin gyi /
translated: This is the case for the moments of sound that are seen by direct perception,

original: rgyu tha dad pa dag la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu tha dad pa dag la ni ma yin no //
translated: but not for different causes.

original: rang bzhin gyi khyad par gyi yul blang bar 'dod pa la ni blang bar bya ba gcig nye bar mkho ba yin gyi /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi khyad par gyi yul blang bar 'dod pa la ni blang bar bya ba gcig nye bar mkho ba yin gyi /
translated: When one wishes to take as an object a particular nature, only one thing to be taken is required,

original: gzhan blang bar bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan blang bar bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: not another.

original: lkog tu gyur pa la ni yul gyi khyad par ma bzung ba'i phyir thun mong gi rang bzhin du zhen pas tha dad pa nges par blang bar mi 'dod de des na ma nges par blang bar bya ba rnams nye bar mkho ba ma nges pa yin no
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa la ni yul gyi khyad par ma bzung ba'i phyir thun mong gi rang bzhin du zhen pas tha dad pa nges par blang bar mi 'dod de des na ma nges par blang bar bya ba rnams nye bar mkho ba ma nges pa yin no
translated: But when it is hidden, since the particular object is not apprehended, one does not wish to definitely take the different common natures. Therefore, the things to be taken are indefinite.

original: // nye bar mkho ba nges pa ni sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: // nye bar mkho ba nges pa ni sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis so //
translated: The definite requirement is as explained above.

original: nye bar mkho ba ma nges pa la ni rim pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa rnams las dang po tshad ma yin la gzhan rnams ni dran par byed pa po nyid do //
analyzed: nye bar mkho ba ma nges pa la ni rim pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa rnams las dang po tshad ma yin la gzhan rnams ni dran par byed pa po nyid do //
translated: In the case of a need that is not definite, the first cognition that has a sequence is a means of valid cognition, and the others are just reminders.

original: nye bar mkho ba nges pa rnams la ni so so kho nar ro //
analyzed: nye bar mkho ba nges pa rnams la ni so so kho nar ro //
translated: In the case of definite needs, each one is a means of valid cognition.

original: mngon sum ni skad cig gis yul mkho ba gcig pa nyid do //
analyzed: mngon sum ni skad cig gis yul mkho ba gcig pa nyid do //
translated: Direct perception is a means of valid cognition in the case of a single object that is needed in an instant.

original: des na tshad ma gcig gi yul du ston pa na bsgrub par bya ba tha dad pa'i skad cig ma 'dzin pa ma gtogs pa dbang po rnams grub pa dang bde ba tha mi dad par bshad do //
analyzed: des na tshad ma gcig gi yul du ston pa na bsgrub par bya ba tha dad pa'i skad cig ma 'dzin pa ma gtogs pa dbang po rnams grub pa dang bde ba tha mi dad par bshad do //
translated: Therefore, when the object of a single means of valid cognition is shown, it is explained that the senses are established as not different from pleasure, except for the apprehension of different instants of the object to be established.

original: lkog tu gyur ba'i yul la ni thun mong gi 'bras bu la de dag nye bar sbyor ba tha mi dad do zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyun la brten nas rnam pa gnyis su bshad do //
analyzed: lkog tu gyur ba'i yul la ni thun mong gi 'bras bu la de dag nye bar sbyor ba tha mi dad do zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyun la brten nas rnam pa gnyis su bshad do //
translated: In the case of a hidden object, it is explained in two ways based on a continuum, saying that they are applied without difference to a common effect, and so on.

original: des na gang zhig gang gis nges pa de ni des 'jug pa'i yul du byas pa yin la /
analyzed: des na gang zhig gang gis nges pa de ni des 'jug pa'i yul du byas pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, that which is ascertained by something is made the object of engagement by that.

original: de nyid de'i thob par byed pa yin pa na tshad ma yin pa'i phyir nges pa'i don 'jug pa'i yul yin zhing de yang tshad ma'i thob par bya ba yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir 'di dag gis don yongs su bcad nas 'jug pa na don bya ba
analyzed: de nyid de'i thob par byed pa yin pa na tshad ma yin pa'i phyir nges pa'i don 'jug pa'i yul yin zhing de yang tshad ma'i thob par bya ba yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir 'di dag gis don yongs su bcad nas 'jug pa na don bya ba
translated: Also, it is the object to be attained by valid knowledge.

original: la slu ba med do zhes bshad do //
analyzed: la slu ba med do zhes bshad do //
translated: When one engages in an object after ascertaining it by means of these, one is not deceived with regard to the object‚Äôs function.

original: yang gang gi tshe don byed pa'i thabs 'dod pas rab tu sbyar ba 'dod pa'i thabs thob pa'i don ched kyi bya ba 'jug pa yin pa de'i tshe yul shes pas nye bar gzhag pa na shes pa dang 'brel ba yin no //
analyzed: yang gang gi tshe don byed pa'i thabs 'dod pas rab tu sbyar ba 'dod pa'i thabs thob pa'i don ched kyi bya ba 'jug pa yin pa de'i tshe yul shes pas nye bar gzhag pa na shes pa dang 'brel ba yin no //
translated: When one engages in an object for the sake of obtaining the means of accomplishing the object one desires, then the object is posited by consciousness and is related to consciousness.

original: yul 'jog par byed pa nyid kyis shes pa ni rgyu yin no //
analyzed: yul 'jog par byed pa nyid kyis shes pa ni rgyu yin no //
translated: Consciousness is the cause of positing the object.

original: 'di ltar 'jug pa'i yul thams cad kyi 'jog par byed pa ni shes pa las mi 'da' ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'jug pa'i yul thams cad kyi 'jog par byed pa ni shes pa las mi 'da' ste /
translated: Thus the positing of all objects of engagement does not go beyond consciousness.

original: 'di ltar the tshom gyis yul 'jog par byed pa'i shes pa dang / phyin ci log gi shes pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa rnams las 'jug pa gang yin pa de ji lta ji @208b ltar yul shes pas nye bar bstan pa de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa na de la 'khrul ba med pa'i phyir de'iüîΩrgyu mtshan can yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar the tshom gyis yul 'jog par byed pa'i shes pa dang / phyin ci log gi shes pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa rnams las 'jug pa gang yin pa de ji lta ji @208b ltar yul shes pas nye bar bstan pa de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa na de la 'khrul ba med pa'i phyir de'i rgyu mtshan can yin no //
translated: Thus, when one engages in an object by means of a cognition that apprehends the object through doubt, or by means of a mistaken cognition, or by means of a non-mistaken correct cognition, then, in accordance with the object that is presented by the cognition, one follows the object when it is present and one does not follow it when it is absent.üîΩSince one is not mistaken with regard to that, one has a reason for engaging in the object.

original: de'i rgyu ni dang po'i shes pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i rgyu ni dang po'i shes pa yin no //
translated: The reason is the initial cognition.

original: gzhan dag ni gang gi tshe don gzhan la zhugs pa na gzhan thob pa de'i tshe thob pa de ni shes pa snga mas byas pa'i snga ma'i 'jug pa las yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni gang gi tshe don gzhan la zhugs pa na gzhan thob pa de'i tshe thob pa de ni shes pa snga mas byas pa'i snga ma'i 'jug pa las yin no //
translated: Others say that when one engages in one object and obtains another, then the obtaining of that object is due to the prior engagement of the prior cognition.

original: shes pa snga ma de de thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i 'jug pa'i yul 'jog par byed pa ni ma yin la /
analyzed: shes pa snga ma de de thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i 'jug pa'i yul 'jog par byed pa ni ma yin la /
translated: The prior cognition is not the cause that establishes the object of the engagement that obtains that object.

original: rgyu yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: rgyu yin pa kho na'o //
translated: It is only the cause of the engagement.

original: dper na bum pa'i shes pa las bum pa'i don du zhugs pas bar du snam bu thob pa na de la 'jug par byed pa ni shes pa snga ma nyid yin te /
analyzed: dper na bum pa'i shes pa las bum pa'i don du zhugs pas bar du snam bu thob pa na de la 'jug par byed pa ni shes pa snga ma nyid yin te /
translated: For example, when one engages in the object of a pot through the cognition of a pot, and in the interim obtains a cloth, the cognition that engages it is the prior cognition,

original: de med na de la mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med na de la mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because without it, one would not engage it.

original: snga ma bum pa'i shes pa de snam bu ston par byed pa ni ma yin no zhes rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: snga ma bum pa'i shes pa de snam bu ston par byed pa ni ma yin no zhes rtogs par byed do //
translated: And one understands that the prior cognition of a pot does not reveal the cloth.

original: de ni de ltar mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ni de ltar mi rigs te /
translated: That is not so, because

original: gang gi phyir de la yang snam bu'i yul can gyi 'jug pa ni bum pa'i shes pa'i rgyu can du 'jug par mi nus te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de la yang snam bu'i yul can gyi 'jug pa ni bum pa'i shes pa'i rgyu can du 'jug par mi nus te /
translated: the engagement of the object of a cloth cannot be the cause of the cognition of a pot.

original: gang gi phyir de'i rgyu can gyi dngos po ni de'i 'bras bu'i bdag nyid yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de'i rgyu can gyi dngos po ni de'i 'bras bu'i bdag nyid yin no //
translated: Because the nature of the effect of that is the cause of that.

original: 'bras bu yang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa yin na snam bu'i yul can gyi 'jug pa ni bum pa'i shes pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu yang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa yin na snam bu'i yul can gyi 'jug pa ni bum pa'i shes pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa yang ma yin no //
translated: And the effect is that which follows after and conforms to the positive and negative concomitance. But the engagement of the object of a cloth does not follow after and conform to the cognition of a pot.

original: de med kyang gzhan gyi tshe de mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med kyang gzhan gyi tshe de mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: But even if it does not exist, the other does see it.

original: snam bu 'dzin pa'i shes pa la ni nam yang 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir de dang 'brel pa yin no //
analyzed: snam bu 'dzin pa'i shes pa la ni nam yang 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir de dang 'brel pa yin no //
translated: But the cognition that apprehends the cloth is never in error, and so it is related to the cloth.

original: de'i phyir ston pa po ma yin pa'i shes pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su mi byed pa'i rgyu'i dngos por mi 'thad pa'i phyir de ni 'jug pa'i rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir ston pa po ma yin pa'i shes pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su mi byed pa'i rgyu'i dngos por mi 'thad pa'i phyir de ni 'jug pa'i rgyu ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since it is not tenable that the cloth is the cause of the cognition that does not follow the cognition of the one who is not the demonstrator, the cloth is not the cause of the cognition.

original: des na bum pa'i shes pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi 'jug pa ni gzhan yin la snam bu'i shes pa la 'khrul pa med pa snam bu thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i 'jug pa yang gzhan yin no zhes shes par bya'o //
analyzed: des na bum pa'i shes pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi 'jug pa ni gzhan yin la snam bu'i shes pa la 'khrul pa med pa snam bu thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i 'jug pa yang gzhan yin no zhes shes par bya'o //
translated: Thus, the engagement that is the causal basis of the cognition of the pot is one thing, and the engagement that is the causal basis of the cognition of the cloth, which is not in error with regard to the cloth, is another.

original: de ltar na 'jug pa gang gi rgyu mtshan yin pa de ni shes pa des nye bar bstan pa'i yul can nyid de /
analyzed: de ltar na 'jug pa gang gi rgyu mtshan yin pa de ni shes pa des nye bar bstan pa'i yul can nyid de /
translated: Thus, that which is the causal basis of the engagement of a cognition is the object that is indicated by that cognition.

original: dper na ba lang gi shes pa'i rgyu mtshan can ba lang gi yul can gyi 'jug pa la ba lang gi shes pas nye bar bstan pa'i yul can yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na ba lang gi shes pa'i rgyu mtshan can ba lang gi yul can gyi 'jug pa la ba lang gi shes pas nye bar bstan pa'i yul can yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, the engagement that has the sign of the consciousness of an ox and has the object of an ox is the subject that is indicated by the consciousness of an ox.

original: des na nye bar bstan pa'i yul can ma yin pa'i 'jug pa la ni de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes @209a * //
analyzed: des na nye bar bstan pa'i yul can ma yin pa'i 'jug pa la ni de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes @209a * //
translated: Therefore, in the case of engagement that is not the subject that is indicated, there is no following of that and no reversal of that.

original: su byed pa med pa'i phyir de'i rgyu mtshan can ldog par byed pa'i 'gal ba yod pa yin no //
analyzed: su byed pa med pa'i phyir de'i rgyu mtshan can ldog par byed pa'i 'gal ba yod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, in the case of the engagement that is the subject that is indicated, there is the existence of the contradictory that is the sign of that.

original: des na des nye bar bstan pa'i yul can nyid ni de'i rgyu mtshan can tsam gyi rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: des na des nye bar bstan pa'i yul can nyid ni de'i rgyu mtshan can tsam gyi rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir rang bzhin yin no //
translated: Therefore, the subject that is indicated by that is the nature of that, because it follows merely the sign of that.

original: yang gang zhig gang gi rgyu mtshan gyi 'jug pa'i yul yin pa de ni de'i 'jug pa'i yul yin par brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: yang gang zhig gang gi rgyu mtshan gyi 'jug pa'i yul yin pa de ni de'i 'jug pa'i yul yin par brjod pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, that which is the object of engagement that has that as its sign is said to be the object of engagement of that.

original: des byas pa'i 'jug pa'i yul nyid ni de'i rgyu mtshan gyi dngos po nyid de /
analyzed: des byas pa'i 'jug pa'i yul nyid ni de'i rgyu mtshan gyi dngos po nyid de /
translated: The object of engagement that is produced by that is the state of having that as its sign,

original: des nye bar bstan pa'i yul yin pas so //
analyzed: des nye bar bstan pa'i yul yin pas so //
translated: because it is the object that is indicated by that.

original: des na 'jug pa'i yul nyid la ni nges pas khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: des na 'jug pa'i yul nyid la ni nges pas khyab pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the object of engagement is necessarily ascertained.

original: ma nges na de'i rgyu mtshan khyab par byed pa 'jug pa'i yul med pa'i phyir khyab par bya ba de'i yul med do //
analyzed: ma nges na de'i rgyu mtshan khyab par byed pa 'jug pa'i yul med pa'i phyir khyab par bya ba de'i yul med do //
translated: If it is not ascertained, then because the reason for that, the pervader, does not engage the object, the pervaded does not engage that object.

original: des na gang zhig gang gis ma nges pa de ni de'i 'jug pa'i yul ma yin la /
analyzed: des na gang zhig gang gis ma nges pa de ni de'i 'jug pa'i yul ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, that which is not ascertained by something is not the object of engagement of that.

original: gang zhig gang gis nges par byed pa po ma yin pa de yang der 'jug par byed pa po ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang gis nges par byed pa po ma yin pa de yang der 'jug par byed pa po ma yin te /
translated: And that which is not the agent of ascertaining something is not the agent of engaging that.

original: dper na ba lang gi shes pas nges par ma byas pa'i rta 'am /
analyzed: dper na ba lang gi shes pas nges par ma byas pa'i rta 'am /
translated: For example, a cognition of a cow is not the agent of ascertaining a horse,

original: de nyid rta'i nges par byed pa po ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de nyid rta'i nges par byed pa po ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: or that very [cow cognition] is not the agent of ascertaining a horse.

original: yul dang yul can gyi chos la ltos nas khyab par byed pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yul dang yul can gyi chos la ltos nas khyab par byed pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The non-observation of the pervader is in terms of the relation between subject and object.

original: 'di lta bu'i rigs can gyi sbyor ba la phyogs kyi chos bsdu ba ni thams cad du log par rtogs pa'i yul la ltos par bya ba'am yin pa /
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i rigs can gyi sbyor ba la phyogs kyi chos bsdu ba ni thams cad du log par rtogs pa'i yul la ltos par bya ba'am yin pa /
translated: In this type of syllogism, the inclusion of the property of the subject is always to be understood in terms of the object of a mistaken cognition.

original: de'i phyir ma byas so //
analyzed: de'i phyir ma byas so //
translated: Therefore, it is not stated.

original: 'jug pa'i yul yang don byed par bzod pa'i dngos po nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'jug pa'i yul yang don byed par bzod pa'i dngos po nyid yin te /
translated: The object of engagement is also a thing that is able to perform a function.

original: de'i don du gnyer ba rnams gzhan du 'jug par mi 'thad pa'i phyir dang / don du mi gnyer ba 'jug pa'i dbang du ma byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i don du gnyer ba rnams gzhan du 'jug par mi 'thad pa'i phyir dang / don du mi gnyer ba 'jug pa'i dbang du ma byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is not tenable that those who seek its object engage in something else, and because engagement is not taken as a basis for not seeking an object.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las dngos po'i rang bzhin rnam pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa nyid yin par mthong ste /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las dngos po'i rang bzhin rnam pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa nyid yin par mthong ste /
translated: The nature of a thing that possesses a specific attribute is seen to be that which is concomitant with and that which is inconsistent with.

original: dper na chu dang me la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na chu dang me la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like water and fire.

original: rnam pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin de yang rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa ni mngon sum mam rjes su dpag pas snang ba dang rnam par brtag pa tha mi dad par zhen pas nges par byas te /
analyzed: rnam pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin de yang rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa ni mngon sum mam rjes su dpag pas snang ba dang rnam par brtag pa tha mi dad par zhen pas nges par byas te /
translated: That nature which possesses a specific attribute is ascertained by direct perception or inference, through the apprehension of its own characteristic, without the superimposition of any other appearance or conceptualization.

original: ji ltar rnam pa'i khyad par dang 'brel pa don bya ba la nye bar mkho bar mthong ba dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa de bzhin du 'das pa dang da ltar la sogs pa'i dus kyi khyad par dang / rten pa'i yul gyi khyad par yang nye bar mkho ba can gyi rang bzhin du mthong ngo //
analyzed: ji ltar rnam pa'i khyad par dang 'brel pa don bya ba la nye bar mkho bar mthong ba dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa de bzhin du 'das pa dang da ltar la sogs pa'i dus kyi khyad par dang / rten pa'i yul gyi khyad par yang nye bar mkho ba can gyi rang bzhin du mthong ngo //
translated: Just as the nature of a thing is seen to be related to the particular aspect and to be required for the performance of a function, in the same way, the particular time, such as past or present, and the particular place that is the basis are seen to be required for the nature of a thing.

original: de la rnam pa'i @209b khyad par ni nges pa yin no //
analyzed: de la rnam pa'i @209b khyad par ni nges pa yin no //
translated: Among them, the particular aspect is definite.

original: yul dang dus dag ni ma nges pa yin te /
analyzed: yul dang dus dag ni ma nges pa yin te /
translated: Place and time are indefinite.

original: des na rnam pa'i khyad par bzhin du dngos po yul dang dus gang du don bya ba la nye bar mkho ba snang ba'i yul dang dus de la 'khrul bar lta ba 'am rtog par 'dod pa'i shes pa ni log pa'i shes pa nyid do //
analyzed: des na rnam pa'i khyad par bzhin du dngos po yul dang dus gang du don bya ba la nye bar mkho ba snang ba'i yul dang dus de la 'khrul bar lta ba 'am rtog par 'dod pa'i shes pa ni log pa'i shes pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, just like the particular aspect, the thing is seen to be mistaken with regard to the place and time that are required for the appearance of the performance of a function in a particular place and time. The cognition that is asserted to be mistaken is a mistaken cognition.

original: gang gi phyir don byed pa la mi 'khrul ba'i yul lam /
analyzed: gang gi phyir don byed pa la mi 'khrul ba'i yul lam /
translated: Because if the place or time that is not mistaken with regard to the performance of a function is abandoned,

original: dus btang na ni dngos po de nyid yongs su spang bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: dus btang na ni dngos po de nyid yongs su spang bar 'gyur te /
translated: then that very thing is completely abandoned.

original: yul dang dus tha dad pa yang dngos po tha dad par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul dang dus tha dad pa yang dngos po tha dad par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a different place and time make things different.

original: gzhan du na rnam par rtog pa tha dad pa yang tha dad par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir thams cad gcig tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na rnam par rtog pa tha dad pa yang tha dad par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir thams cad gcig tu 'gyur ro //

analyzed: gang gi phyir gang gi khyad par can gyi yul gzung ba'i phyir don byed par dmigs pa de nyid de la don dam pa'i yul yin no //
translated: Because the object that is the basis for the performance of a function is the ultimate object, since it is apprehended as the object that has the distinction of that.

analyzed: des na gnas par mthong ba ni ma yin no //

analyzed: yul dang dus tha dad pas mthong ba dngos po la 'khrul pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi 'jug pa yong ngo //
translated: The seeing of an object is not only confused because of the distance of the place and the time; it is also confused because of the distance of the object.

original: 'di ltar yul gzhan gyi dngos po la gzhan dang 'brel bar gzung ba na yul dang dus gzhan dang 'brel pa la zhugs pa nam yang mngon par 'dod pa thob par mi 'gyur ro //

translated: Thus, when the object of another is apprehended as related to another, the object that is related to another place and time never obtains the desired result.

original: de'i phyir yul dang dus dang rnam pa nges pa don byed pa yin par mthong ba'i phyir dang / don byed pa yang 'jug pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir yul dang dus dang rnam pa nges pa 'jug pa'i gzhi yin pa nyid kyis yul dang dus dang rnam pa'i dngos po don byed par nus pa ni 'jug pa'i yul yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir yul dang dus dang rnam pa nges pa don byed pa yin par mthong ba'i phyir dang / don byed pa yang 'jug pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir yul dang dus dang rnam pa nges pa 'jug pa'i gzhi yin pa nyid kyis yul dang dus dang rnam pa'i dngos po don byed par nus pa ni 'jug pa'i yul yin la /

analyzed: de lta bu nyid du gyur pa nges par byed pa po yang 'jug par byed pa yin no //
translated: The one who ascertains the object in that way is also the one who engages.

original: de'i phyir yul dang dus dang rnam pa nges pa'i don gang zhig gang gis gtan la phebs pa de nyid de'i 'jug pa'i yul yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir yul dang dus dang rnam pa nges pa'i don gang zhig gang gis gtan la phebs pa de nyid de'i 'jug pa'i yul yin te /
translated: Therefore, the object, time, and aspect of a definite object that is ascertained by a certain person are the object of engagement of that person.

original: gtan la ma phebs pa ni 'jug pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gtan la ma phebs pa ni 'jug pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: because that which is not ascertained is not the object of engagement.

original: yul dang dus dang rnam pa gzhan dang 'brel pa ni gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul dang dus dang rnam pa gzhan dang 'brel pa ni gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is related to another object, time, and aspect.

original: gzhan nges pa na gzhan nges pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan nges pa na gzhan nges pa ni ma yin te /
translated: When one is ascertained, the other is not ascertained,

original: ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that there would be an infinite regress.

original: nges pa nyid kyi 'jug pa'i yul thob par byed pa ni tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: nges pa nyid kyi 'jug pa'i yul thob par byed pa ni tshad ma yin la /
translated: That which causes one to obtain the object of engagement, which is ascertainment itself, is a valid cognition.

original: cig shos ni tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: cig shos ni tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: The other is not a valid cognition.

original: de la don byed par nus pa'i rnam pa gzhan 'dzin pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'jug pa'i yul nyid ma yin te //
analyzed: de la don byed par nus pa'i rnam pa gzhan 'dzin pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'jug pa'i yul nyid ma yin te //

original: dper na smig rgyu la /
analyzed: dper na smig rgyu la /
translated: For example, with regard to a mirage,

original: tshur shes pas bsku ba la sogs pa nus pa'i rnam pa nyid gzung ba 'jug pa'i yul yin gyi /
analyzed: tshur shes pas bsku ba la sogs pa nus pa'i rnam pa nyid gzung ba 'jug pa'i yul yin gyi /
translated: the aspect that is able to perform a function, such as the apprehension of water, is the object of engagement.

original: smig rgyu ni ma bzung ba des na shes pa gzhan dang 'brel ba'i 'jug pa'i spyod yul thob pa par bya ba yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: smig rgyu ni ma bzung ba des na shes pa gzhan dang 'brel ba'i 'jug pa'i spyod yul thob pa par bya ba yin pa bzhin no //
translated: But the mirage is not apprehended, and thus it is the object of engagement that is related to another cognition and causes one to obtain it.

original: de bzhin du nor bu'i 'od la nur bur shes pa'i 'jug pa'i yul ni 'od kyi yul gyi nor bu nyid yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du nor bu'i 'od la nur bur shes pa'i 'jug pa'i yul ni 'od kyi yul gyi nor bu nyid yin no //
translated: In the same way, the object of the operation of the cognition that knows the gem as the light is the gem that is the object of the light.

original: nor bu thob pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: nor bu thob pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The acquisition of the gem is as before.

original: gang gi phyir don byed par rung ba mthong ba'i yul gang yin pa de nyid 'jug pa'i yul yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir don byed par rung ba mthong ba'i yul gang yin pa de nyid 'jug pa'i yul yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: The object of the operation is just the object that is seen as fit for the performance of a function, not anything else.

original: gzugs mtshungs kyang yul tha dad pa yang tha dad par byed pa yin @210b pa'i phyir gzhan nyid du nges so //
analyzed: gzugs mtshungs kyang yul tha dad pa yang tha dad par byed pa yin @210b pa'i phyir gzhan nyid du nges so //
translated: The difference of the gem from the light is ascertained because the gem is the cause of the difference of the objects, even though the form of the two is the same.

analyzed: yul gzhan na gnas pa nges pa na gzugs mtshungs pa'i phyir yul gzhan na gnas pa nges pa ni ma yin te /
translated: When the gem is ascertained as existing in another place, it is not ascertained as existing in another place because of the sameness of form.

original: ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because of the absurdity of the consequence.

original: de'i phyir yul gzhan na gnas pa'i nor bu 'dis ma nges pas 'di'i 'jug pa'i yul ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir yul gzhan na gnas pa'i nor bu 'dis ma nges pas 'di'i 'jug pa'i yul ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, because of the uncertainty of this gem existing in another place, it is not the object of the operation.

original: 'jug pa'i yul ma yin par thob par byed pa yang sngar nyid du bsal zin to //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i yul ma yin par thob par byed pa yang sngar nyid du bsal zin to //
translated: The acquisition of what is not the object of the operation has already been refuted.

original: khyad par du yang rjes su dpag pa ni chos can 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: khyad par du yang rjes su dpag pa ni chos can 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: In particular, inference is the apprehension of the subject.

original: de la 'khrul na ni der snang par brjod do //
analyzed: de la 'khrul na ni der snang par brjod do //
translated: If there is error in that, it is said to appear as that.

analyzed: ji ltar rung rung du chos can yongs su rtog na ni /

original: 'di yang bsgrubs zin to //
analyzed: 'di yang bsgrubs zin to //
translated: This has already been established.

original: ha cang spros pas chog go //
analyzed: ha cang spros pas chog go //
translated: Enough with too much elaboration.

original: / tshad ma brtag pa /
analyzed: / tshad ma brtag pa /
translated: The Examination of Valid Cognition

original: bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma /
analyzed: bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma /
translated: The second and final part.

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du yul gzhan gnas pa nges pa'i shes pa las yul gzhan thob par smra ba na tshad ma'i yul mi shes pa yin te /
translated: When it is said that the cognition of the ascertainment of the existence of another object is the attainment of another object in every way, then the object of valid cognition is not known.

original: de la de las gzhan ci zhig brjod /
analyzed: de la de las gzhan ci zhig brjod /
translated: What else could be said about it?

original: rnam pa rtog pa 'di ni gnyi ga'i rang gi mtshan nyid mthong ba la ltos nas rang bzhin gzhan sgro 'dogs par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa rtog pa 'di ni gnyi ga'i rang gi mtshan nyid mthong ba la ltos nas rang bzhin gzhan sgro 'dogs par byed pa yin te /
translated: This conceptualization is a superimposition of a nature that is different from the two, based on seeing the intrinsic identity of the two.

analyzed: dper na chu dang smig rgyu mthong ba la ltos nas smig rgyu la chur rtogs pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, based on seeing water and a mirage, one conceptualizes the mirage as water.

analyzed: 'di la sgro gdags par bya ba dang sgro btags pa'i yul gnyis 'brel ba'i phyir 'od kyi yul can gyi shes pa ni 'brel ba gzhan gyi yul can thob par byed pa'i shes pa gzhan gyi rgyu yin pa des na phan tshun thob par byed par brjod la
translated: Here, the object of the cognition of light is the cause of another cognition that obtains the object of another connection, because the two, the object of the superimposition and the object of the superimposition itself, are connected. Therefore, they are said to be mutually obtained.

original: / gzhan du ni de ltar ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: / gzhan du ni de ltar ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
translated: But it is not so in other cases. This is the distinction.

analyzed: gang gi phyir rnam pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin gang zhig gang gis nges pa de nyid de'i 'jug pa'i yul yin no //
translated: Because the nature that possesses the distinction of the aspect is ascertained by that, that itself is the object of its engagement.

original: de'i phyir dung la ser por shes pa'i 'jug pa'i yul ni ser po'i rang bzhin gyi dung nyid yin na de ni med la /
analyzed: de'i phyir dung la ser por shes pa'i 'jug pa'i yul ni ser po'i rang bzhin gyi dung nyid yin na de ni med la /
translated: Therefore, the object of engagement of the cognition of yellow in a conch is a conch that has the nature of yellow, but that does not exist.

original: yod pa'i dkar po'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de yang ma nges pa de ni 'jug pa'i yul ma yin no //üîΩgang la dung dkar po nyid kyi rnam @211a * //
analyzed: yod pa'i dkar po'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de yang ma nges pa de ni 'jug pa'i yul ma yin no // gang la dung dkar po nyid kyi rnam @211a * //

analyzed: gal te de lta na dkar po'i rang bzhin log na rang bzhin gzhan skyes pa 'am /
translated: If that is so, when the nature of white is refuted, does another nature arise?

original: ci ste dung gi rang bzhin gnyis ka ltar yang don byed pa la nye bar sbyor ba yin yang bla ste /
analyzed: ci ste dung gi rang bzhin gnyis ka ltar yang don byed pa la nye bar sbyor ba yin yang bla ste /
translated: Or, if you say that the nature of a conch is both, it is fine,

original: ji ltar tha snyad 'dogs pa po rnams kyis dkar po kho nar mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: ji ltar tha snyad 'dogs pa po rnams kyis dkar po kho nar mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: but how is it that those who designate it see it only as white?

analyzed: yod pa ni don byed pa'i rang bzhin yin la rnam pa tha dad par nya bar sbyor ba dag gcig tu rig na dngos po tha dad par khas blang bar yang ji ltar nus //
translated: That which exists has the nature of performing a function. If those who engage in different aspects know it as one, how can they assert that it is different?

original: snang ba'i kha dog gi rang bzhin ni dung yin par mi smra'i 'on kyang dbyibs yin no zhe na /
analyzed: snang ba'i kha dog gi rang bzhin ni dung yin par mi smra'i 'on kyang dbyibs yin no zhe na /
translated: But we do not say that the nature of the color of the appearance is the conch, but rather that the shape is.

analyzed: kha dog gi rang bzhin las dbyibs tha mi dad pa ma yin nam //
translated: But is the shape not non-different from the nature of the color?
