analyzed: don byed par nus pa'i kha dog dkar po btang na de'i dbyibs kyang btang ba yin la /
translated: If the white color that is able to perform a function is removed, then the shape is also removed.

original: snang ba'i ser po'i rang bzhin dang dbyer med pa dang ldan pa'i dbyibs ni de'i rang bzhin nyid yin gyi ma mthong ba'i dkar po ni ma yin no //
analyzed: snang ba'i ser po'i rang bzhin dang dbyer med pa dang ldan pa'i dbyibs ni de'i rang bzhin nyid yin gyi ma mthong ba'i dkar po ni ma yin no //
translated: The shape that is inseparable from the nature of the yellow appearance is the nature of that, but it is not the unseen white.

original: de nyid kyi phyir ser po bzhin du dngos po med pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir ser po bzhin du dngos po med pa bzhin no //
translated: For that very reason, it is like the yellow, not like the non-existent.

original: 'di ltar gang cung zad du ma'i thun mong du gtogs pa'i rang bzhin de ni du ma las tha mi dad pas de'i rang bzhin du yod pa yin gyi //
analyzed: 'di ltar gang cung zad du ma'i thun mong du gtogs pa'i rang bzhin de ni du ma las tha mi dad pas de'i rang bzhin du yod pa yin gyi //
translated: Thus, whatever is the nature that belongs to the many in common is not different from the many, and so it exists as the nature of that,

original: gcig gi rang bzhin du ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig gi rang bzhin du ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: but it does not exist as the nature of the one.

original: 'di ltar mang po rnams rang bzhin gcig pa nyid tshad mas bsal ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar mang po rnams rang bzhin gcig pa nyid tshad mas bsal ba nyid yin no //
translated: Thus, the many are excluded from being the same nature by valid knowledge.

original: des na ji ltar skad cig ma nyid dam dngos po nyid du ma'i thun mong du brtags pa na /
analyzed: des na ji ltar skad cig ma nyid dam dngos po nyid du ma'i thun mong du brtags pa na /
translated: Therefore, when the nature of momentariness or entityness is imputed in common to many,

original: sngon po la sogs pa du ma las tha mi dad pa de'i rang bzhin yin pas du ma nyid du bden ba yin la /
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa du ma las tha mi dad pa de'i rang bzhin yin pas du ma nyid du bden ba yin la /
translated: since it is the nature of many, such as blue, it is not different from them, and therefore it is truly established as many.

original: de la gcig pa nyid du ni btags pa yin no //
analyzed: de la gcig pa nyid du ni btags pa yin no //
translated: But it is imputed as one.

original: de bzhin du dbyibs kyi khyad par yang sngon po la sogs pa du ma la thun mong du de'i rang bzhin du yod pas de kho nar 'gyur gyi rang dbang du ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du dbyibs kyi khyad par yang sngon po la sogs pa du ma la thun mong du de'i rang bzhin du yod pas de kho nar 'gyur gyi rang dbang du ni ma yin te /
translated: In the same way, the particular shape is also the nature of many, such as blue, and it exists in common, and therefore it is just that, but it is not independent,

original: rang nyid las ni tha dad pas mi bden pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang nyid las ni tha dad pas mi bden pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not real, since it is different from itself.

original: gal te sngon po yang dbyibs du ma'i thun mong ba de'i rang bzhin du bden pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te sngon po yang dbyibs du ma'i thun mong ba de'i rang bzhin du bden pa yin no //
translated: If blue is also the nature of many shapes, it is truly established.

original: khyad par yod na yang brjod par bya'o zhe na smras pa /
analyzed: khyad par yod na yang brjod par bya'o zhe na smras pa /
translated: If there is a difference, it should be stated.

original: de du ma'i thun mong ba zhes bya ba ni gang zhig mthong na nges par rtogs shing ma mthong na mi rtogs la /
analyzed: de du ma'i thun mong ba zhes bya ba ni gang zhig mthong na nges par rtogs shing ma mthong na mi rtogs la /
translated: We say: That which is called the nature of many is that which is definitely understood when it is seen and not understood when it is not seen.

original: de'i rang bzhin du yang rtogs te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin du yang rtogs te /
translated: One also understands its nature.

original: dper na sngon po'i dngos po nyid sngon po la sogs pa du ma med na ni mi rtogs la /
analyzed: dper na sngon po'i dngos po nyid sngon po la sogs pa du ma med na ni mi rtogs la /
translated: For example, if the entity of blue does not exist as manifold, it is not understood.

original: de yod na ni de'i rang bzhin nyid du rtogs la /
analyzed: de yod na ni de'i rang bzhin nyid du rtogs la /
translated: If it exists, one understands it as its nature.

original: de la thun @211b mong bar yang brtags pa ni //
analyzed: de la thun @211b mong bar yang brtags pa ni //
translated: The investigation of the common is as follows.

original: du ma de'i bdag nyid du yod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: du ma de'i bdag nyid du yod pa bzhin no //
translated: It exists as the nature of the manifold.

original: de ltar yang sngon po ni dbyibs mthong na mthong ba dang de'i rang bzhin du dmigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar yang sngon po ni dbyibs mthong na mthong ba dang de'i rang bzhin du dmigs pa ma yin te /
translated: In the same way, when one sees the shape of blue, one does not see it and does not apprehend it as its nature.

original: dbyibs log kyang sngon po dmigs pa'i phyir dang / dbyibs nye yang rdul phra rab tsam gyi cha'i sngon po dbyibs kyi bdag nyid ma yin par dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbyibs log kyang sngon po dmigs pa'i phyir dang / dbyibs nye yang rdul phra rab tsam gyi cha'i sngon po dbyibs kyi bdag nyid ma yin par dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because even when the shape is wrong, blue is apprehended, and even when the shape is near, the blue of the part of an atom is not apprehended as the nature of the shape.

original: dbyibs nyid sngon po de mthong na snang zhing de med na mi snang la /
analyzed: dbyibs nyid sngon po de mthong na snang zhing de med na mi snang la /
translated: When one sees the shape of blue, it appears and when it does not exist, it does not appear.

original: snang na yang de'i rang bzhin du snang ba yin te /
analyzed: snang na yang de'i rang bzhin du snang ba yin te /
translated: Even when it appears, it appears as its nature.

original: sngon por snang ba btang na dbyibs mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngon por snang ba btang na dbyibs mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because when the appearance of blue is removed, the shape is not understood.

original: de'i phyir sngon po nyid de la du ma yin zhing du ma'i thun mong ma yin pa dang / gzhi yang yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sngon po nyid de la du ma yin zhing du ma'i thun mong ma yin pa dang / gzhi yang yin no //
translated: Therefore, blue itself is many, and it is not shared by many, and it is the basis.

original: dbyibs ni de lta bu du ma yin gyi /
analyzed: dbyibs ni de lta bu du ma yin gyi /
translated: But shape is not like that.

original: 'on kyang du ma'i thun mong dang / de la brten pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang du ma'i thun mong dang / de la brten pa yin no //
translated: It is many, but it is shared by many, and it is based on that.

original: gang gi phyir de med par mi snang zhing sngon po la sogs pa yod na ni da bdag nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ba de'i phyir sngon po ni skad cig ma nyid la brten pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de med par mi snang zhing sngon po la sogs pa yod na ni da bdag nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ba de'i phyir sngon po ni skad cig ma nyid la brten pa ma yin te /
translated: Because it does not appear without that, and when blue and so on exist, it is cognized as such. Therefore, blue is not based on momentariness.

original: de ma rtogs kyang sngon po ni de ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ma rtogs kyang sngon po ni de ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because even when that is not cognized, blue appears as not having that nature.

original: skad cig ma nyid ni de la brten pa yin no //
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid ni de la brten pa yin no //
translated: Momentarness is based on that.

original: sngon po la sogs pa'i dngos po mthong na de rtogs pa'i phyir dang mthong ba de'i bdag nyid du rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa'i dngos po mthong na de rtogs pa'i phyir dang mthong ba de'i bdag nyid du rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because when a thing such as blue is seen, it is cognized, and because seeing is posited as having the nature of that.

original: ci ste thun mong du rtogs pa 'di du mar yod pa nyid du khas blangs nas de'i rang bzhin du yod par rnam par 'jog pa gang yin pa de la yid brten du ci yod ce na /
analyzed: ci ste thun mong du rtogs pa 'di du mar yod pa nyid du khas blangs nas de'i rang bzhin du yod par rnam par 'jog pa gang yin pa de la yid brten du ci yod ce na /
translated: But if you accept that this common idea exists as many, and you posit it as existing in the nature of those, what confidence can you have in it?

original: bshad pa tha dad pa nyid don byed pa la nye bar sbyor bar snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad pa tha dad pa nyid don byed pa la nye bar sbyor bar snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: We reply: Because the different are seen to be applied to the performance of a function.

original: mthong ba'i gzung ba khyad par kho na don byed pa la nye bar sbyor ba mthong gi spyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba'i gzung ba khyad par kho na don byed pa la nye bar sbyor ba mthong gi spyi ni ma yin no //
translated: We see that only the particular, which is perceived, is applied to the performance of a function, not the universal.

original: yod pa ni don byed pa'i rgyu mtshan can yin no //
analyzed: yod pa ni don byed pa'i rgyu mtshan can yin no //
translated: And existence is the reason for the performance of a function.

original: de nyid kyi phyir skad cig ma nyid ni snang ba sgra la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du don byed pa'i mtshan nyid du yod pa mthong ba las sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir skad cig ma nyid ni snang ba sgra la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du don byed pa'i mtshan nyid du yod pa mthong ba las sgrub par byed do //
translated: Therefore, momentariness is established by the perception of the performance of a function, which is the nature of light, sound, etc.

original: de'i sgrub par byed pa yang khyad par can gyi chos can la brten pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i sgrub par byed pa yang khyad par can gyi chos can la brten pa yin no //
translated: And the proof of that is based on a particular subject.

original: de lta na 'o na dbyibs kyang don byed nus par mthong ba'i phyir ji ltar dngos po ma yin //
analyzed: de lta na 'o na dbyibs kyang don byed nus par mthong ba'i phyir ji ltar dngos po ma yin //
translated: If that is so, then since shape is also seen to be able to perform a function, how is it not a thing?

original: 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin yod pa nyid ni dbyibs kyi thabs kyi dung gis bsgrub par bya ba'i 'bras bu thob par byed do //
analyzed: 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin yod pa nyid ni dbyibs kyi thabs kyi dung gis bsgrub par bya ba'i 'bras bu thob par byed do //
translated: Thus, the existence of its nature is established by the method of shape, and it produces the result to be established.

original: de'i phyir dbyibs rang bzhin gzhan nyid de thob par byed pa yin pa'i phyir don byed pa la de nyid kyi nus pa mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir dbyibs rang bzhin gzhan nyid de thob par byed pa yin pa'i phyir don byed pa la de nyid kyi nus pa mthong ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, since shape is different in nature from that, it is seen to have the ability to perform a function because it produces it.

original: @212a * // 'di la dbyibs ni sngon po'i bdag nyid kho nar rtogs pa yin no zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: @212a * // 'di la dbyibs ni sngon po'i bdag nyid kho nar rtogs pa yin no zhes bshad zin to //
translated: Here it has been explained that shape is only understood as the nature of blue.

original: des na de'i bya ba gzung ba'i sgo nas sngon po nyid kyi bya ba gzung ba yin no //
analyzed: des na de'i bya ba gzung ba'i sgo nas sngon po nyid kyi bya ba gzung ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, by apprehending its action, the action of blue itself is apprehended.

original: gzhan yang dung gi cha shas kyi bye brag nyid dor don byed par mthong gi dbyibs gcig ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang dung gi cha shas kyi bye brag nyid dor don byed par mthong gi dbyibs gcig ni ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, the specific parts of the conch are seen to perform a function, but not a single shape.

original: ji ste 'di ni tshad ma gzhan gyi bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: ji ste 'di ni tshad ma gzhan gyi bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: If this is the object to be established by another valid cognition,

original: mthong ba ni dbyibs gcig la gnas pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mthong ba ni dbyibs gcig la gnas pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that what is seen is the shape that remains the same,

original: de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te /
translated: that is not right.

original: phyogs kyi dbye bas gnas pa rnams ni 'gal ba'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir gcig tu brtags pa tshad mas sel bar byed do //
analyzed: phyogs kyi dbye bas gnas pa rnams ni 'gal ba'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir gcig tu brtags pa tshad mas sel bar byed do //
translated: Because the parts of the directions are contradictory, the idea that they are one is refuted by valid cognition.

original: phyogs kyi cha tha dad pa'i dung 'dzin pa'i shes pa ni gcig la dmigs par mi rigs te /
analyzed: phyogs kyi cha tha dad pa'i dung 'dzin pa'i shes pa ni gcig la dmigs par mi rigs te /
translated: It is not right to say that the consciousness that apprehends a conch as having different directional parts has a single object.

original: de'i phyir mthong ba de nyid rigs pas du ma'i yul can sgrub par byed de /
analyzed: de'i phyir mthong ba de nyid rigs pas du ma'i yul can sgrub par byed de /
translated: Therefore, that seeing itself proves by reasoning that it has many objects.

original: tshu rol mthong ba'i phyogs tha dad pa 'dzin pa ni gcig gi yul can du mi rigs so //
analyzed: tshu rol mthong ba'i phyogs tha dad pa 'dzin pa ni gcig gi yul can du mi rigs so //
translated: It is not right to say that the consciousness that apprehends different directional parts of a thing that is seen has a single object.

original: gzung ba de'i rang bzhin no gcig dang 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: gzung ba de'i rang bzhin no gcig dang 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
translated: Because the nature of the object is contradictory to being one.

original: gzung ba sngon po'i rang bzhin ni nges pa'i rnam pa skad cig ma ma yin pa dang 'gal ba ma yin te /üîΩsnang ba'i rang bzhin de ni yul du gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gzung ba sngon po'i rang bzhin ni nges pa'i rnam pa skad cig ma ma yin pa dang 'gal ba ma yin te / snang ba'i rang bzhin de ni yul du gnas pa'am /
translated: The nature of the object blue is not contradictory to being a nonmomentary aspect.

original: myur du 'gro ba gnyis ka ltar yang mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: myur du 'gro ba gnyis ka ltar yang mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because whether the nature of the appearance is that it abides in the object or that it moves quickly, in both cases there is no contradiction.

original: sngon po'i rnam pa don byed pas de skad cig ma nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: sngon po'i rnam pa don byed pas de skad cig ma nyid yin gyi /
translated: The aspect of blue performs a function, and therefore it is momentary.

original: de ltar 'dzin pa 'gal ba'i phyir ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar 'dzin pa 'gal ba'i phyir ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not because it is contradictory to apprehend it as permanent.

original: 'dir ni de gcig gam du ma yin yang bla ste /
analyzed: 'dir ni de gcig gam du ma yin yang bla ste /
translated: Here, it is irrelevant whether it is one or many.

original: rnam pa thams cad du phyogs tha dad pa'i rnam pa 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no zhes brjod par mi nus te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du phyogs tha dad pa'i rnam pa 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no zhes brjod par mi nus te /
translated: It is impossible to say that in every way, the existence of aspects with different directions is contradictory.

original: phyogs tha dad pa ni gcig dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //üîΩde'i phyir 'dir gcig yin na yang de ltar 'dzin pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir 'dzin pa nyid las dngos po du mas snang ba yin gyi gang gi skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid du dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba sngon po'i shes pa ni skad cig skad cig
analyzed: phyogs tha dad pa ni gcig dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro // de'i phyir 'dir gcig yin na yang de ltar 'dzin pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir 'dzin pa nyid las dngos po du mas snang ba yin gyi gang gi skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid du dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba sngon po'i shes pa ni skad cig skad cig
translated: Because having different directions is contradictory to being one.üîΩTherefore, even if it is one, it is not tenable that it is apprehended in that way.

original: ma du ma 'dzin par rnam par gzhag par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ma du ma 'dzin par rnam par gzhag par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, due to the apprehension itself, it appears as many things. The consciousness of blue is not able to be posited as apprehending many momentary things, because it would be contradictory for it not to be momentary.

original: de'i phyir mthong ba'i gzung ba nyid dngos po du ma'i bya ba dang ldan par snang ba yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir mthong ba'i gzung ba nyid dngos po du ma'i bya ba dang ldan par snang ba yin la /
translated: Therefore, the object that is seen is the appearance that possesses the activity of many things.

original: de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i dbyibs gcig pa med pa'i phyir dang / tha dad pa yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'bras bu la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su 'gro ba ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i dbyibs gcig pa med pa'i phyir dang / tha dad pa yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'bras bu la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su 'gro ba ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: How can there be a relation of cause and effect between them?

original: thams cad du de byed par thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: thams cad du de byed par thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: It follows that everything would produce everything.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩ

original: gnas skabs kyi @212b khyad par dang ldan pa de byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnas skabs kyi @212b khyad par dang ldan pa de byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it produces that which possesses a particular condition.

original: de cam gyis ni de tha dad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de cam gyis ni de tha dad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That alone does not make it different.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dung gi sgra ni bum pa'i sgra bzhin du dbyibs kyi khyad par can 'dod do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dung gi sgra ni bum pa'i sgra bzhin du dbyibs kyi khyad par can 'dod do //
translated: Therefore, like the sound of a pot, the sound of a conch is accepted as having a particular shape.

original: gal te spyod pa phra mo bcug na rdul phra rab kyi blo med pa des na dbyibs sam kha dog kyang bla ste ma brtags na nyams dga' pa ji ltar snang ba bzhin du don byed nus par khas blang ba yin no zhe na bden te /
analyzed: gal te spyod pa phra mo bcug na rdul phra rab kyi blo med pa des na dbyibs sam kha dog kyang bla ste ma brtags na nyams dga' pa ji ltar snang ba bzhin du don byed nus par khas blang ba yin no zhe na bden te /
translated: If you insert a fine probe, then since there is no cognition of a subtle particle, it is irrelevant whether there is a shape or color. If you do not analyze, you should accept that it functions as an object in accordance with how it appears, which is delightful.

original: shes bya nang gi la yin gyi phyi'i don gyi tshul la ni de lta ma yin no //üîΩchad ma'am tshad ma ma yin pa nyid dam /
analyzed: shes bya nang gi la yin gyi phyi'i don gyi tshul la ni de lta ma yin no // chad ma'am tshad ma ma yin pa nyid dam /
translated: But it is not so for the mode of external objects.

original: khyad par gyi mtshan nyid du blo tsam 'ba' zhig la ni slob dpon gyis rnam par ma bzhag ste /
analyzed: khyad par gyi mtshan nyid du blo tsam 'ba' zhig la ni slob dpon gyis rnam par ma bzhag ste /
translated: The master has not posited mere awareness as a valid cognition or as invalid,

original: rnam par shes pa smra ba la tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa'i rnam par gzhag pa yang gzhan mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa smra ba la tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa'i rnam par gzhag pa yang gzhan mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: or as a special characteristic, because he has presented valid cognitions and invalid cognitions in another way in the theory of consciousness.

original: phyi rol gyi tshul gyi yul la tshad ma dang 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa sngar mdzad nas yang rnam par shes pa smra ba la mdzad pa yin no //üîΩdes na tshad ma rnam par gzhag pa yang de kho na ltar yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi tshul gyi yul la tshad ma dang 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa sngar mdzad nas yang rnam par shes pa smra ba la mdzad pa yin no // des na tshad ma rnam par gzhag pa yang de kho na ltar yin no //
translated: Having previously presented valid cognitions and their results in terms of external objects, he presents them again in the theory of consciousness.üîΩTherefore, the presentation of valid cognitions is just like that.

original: des na 'di ni de kho na ltar yin te /
analyzed: des na 'di ni de kho na ltar yin te /
translated: So it is just like that.

original: gang gi phyir mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid bsal pa na dbang po'i rnam par shes pa rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs su don gyis bskyed pa nyid bkod pa yin no //üîΩbrtags pa'i rnam pa'am /
analyzed: gang gi phyir mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid bsal pa na dbang po'i rnam par shes pa rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs su don gyis bskyed pa nyid bkod pa yin no // brtags pa'i rnam pa'am /
translated: Because when the definition of perception is eliminated, the non-conceptual nature of the sense consciousnesses is implicitly stated as the reason.üîΩIt is not produced from a conceptual image,

original: rnam pa dang ldan pa'i rnam par shes pa las ni 'ga' zhig skye ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa dang ldan pa'i rnam par shes pa las ni 'ga' zhig skye ba ni ma yin te /
translated: or from a consciousness endowed with an image, because

original: des na rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid ni de'i rgyu mtshan can du mi 'thad do //
analyzed: des na rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid ni de'i rgyu mtshan can du mi 'thad do //
translated: non-conceptuality is not tenable as the basis for that.

original: 'di rnam par 'grel pa'i gzhung yang shes pa'i tshul la ni mthun pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di rnam par 'grel pa'i gzhung yang shes pa'i tshul la ni mthun pa ma yin no //
translated: The treatise commentary also does not agree with the method of understanding this.

original: gzhan gyi 'dod pas de skad bshad pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan gyi 'dod pas de skad bshad pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is said that this is explained according to the assertions of others,

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dbang du byas pa'i gzhan gyi gzhung blang bar bya ba yin gyi gzhan ma yin pa ma yin nam //
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dbang du byas pa'i gzhan gyi gzhung blang bar bya ba yin gyi gzhan ma yin pa ma yin nam //
translated: isn't it that only the opponent's treatise that is under consideration should be accepted, not others, because it would be absurd?

original: des na tshad ma'i mtshan nyid bshad pa ni ma nges pa'i tshul nyid du bzhed do //
analyzed: des na tshad ma'i mtshan nyid bshad pa ni ma nges pa'i tshul nyid du bzhed do //
translated: Therefore, the explanation of the definition of valid knowledge is accepted as being uncertain.

original: de dag gis don byed nus pa'i don mi rdul phra rab nyid yin la rdul phra rab kyi rang bzhin yang kha dog nyid yin gyi //
analyzed: de dag gis don byed nus pa'i don mi rdul phra rab nyid yin la rdul phra rab kyi rang bzhin yang kha dog nyid yin gyi //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúcapable of effective action‚Äù is the subtle atom itself, and the nature of the subtle atom is color,

original: dbyibs ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dbyibs ni ma yin no //
translated: not shape.

original: das na dbyibs ni kun rdzob tu yod pa yin la /
analyzed: das na dbyibs ni kun rdzob tu yod pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, shape exists conventionally,

original: kha dog ni don dam par yod pa yin no //
analyzed: kha dog ni don dam par yod pa yin no //
translated: but color exists ultimately.

original: 'bras bu la nye bar mkho ba yang de nyid yin gyi dbyibs ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu la nye bar mkho ba yang de nyid yin gyi dbyibs ni ma yin no //
translated: It is also the cause of the effect, not shape.

original: de'i phyir gang zhig don byed pa du ma'i thun mong du de mthong ba na de de'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa de ni tha dad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang zhig don byed pa du ma'i thun mong du de mthong ba na de de'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa de ni tha dad pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, when one sees that which is common to many things that perform effective actions, one understands that to be its nature, and it is not different.

original: dper na @213a * //
analyzed: dper na @213a * //
translated: For example,

original: skad cig ma nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid bzhin no //
translated: like momentariness.

original: dbyibs kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: dbyibs kyang de bzhin no //
translated: Shape is also like that.

original: tha dad par yod pa ni rnam pa tha dad par don la nye bar sbyor bas khyab pa yin te /
analyzed: tha dad par yod pa ni rnam pa tha dad par don la nye bar sbyor bas khyab pa yin te /
translated: That which exists as different is necessarily applied to different aspects of the object,

original: des khas mi len na rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des khas mi len na rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because if one does not accept that, there is no reason.

original: de dang 'gal ba ni tha dad pa med par yul la nye bar sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: de dang 'gal ba ni tha dad pa med par yul la nye bar sbyor ba yin no //
translated: The opposite of that is the application to the object without distinction.

original: dbyibs ni nye bar sbyor ba mang pa yin no zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: dbyibs ni nye bar sbyor ba mang pa yin no zhes bshad zin to //
translated: It has already been explained that shape is the application of many.

original: de'i phyir dbyibs sam dngos po nyid dam //
analyzed: de'i phyir dbyibs sam dngos po nyid dam //
translated: Therefore, shape, or the nature of the thing,

original: skad cig ma'am gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa gzhan yang rung ste /
analyzed: skad cig ma'am gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa gzhan yang rung ste /
translated: or the momentariness, or whatever else is dependent,

original: du ma las don byed pa tha mi dad pa ni rten med na yod pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: du ma las don byed pa tha mi dad pa ni rten med na yod pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: if it is not different from the many, it cannot exist without a basis.

original: des na dkar po'i rang bzhin med na de'i ngo bor gyur pa'i dbyibs med la /
analyzed: des na dkar po'i rang bzhin med na de'i ngo bor gyur pa'i dbyibs med la /
translated: Therefore, if there is no white nature, there is no shape that is its essence.

original: ser po'i dbyibs kyang ser po'i rang bzhin nyid bzhin du de'i rang bzhin ma yin la //
analyzed: ser po'i dbyibs kyang ser po'i rang bzhin nyid bzhin du de'i rang bzhin ma yin la //
translated: And the shape of yellow is not the nature of that, just like the nature of yellow itself.

original: de 'dzin pa yang phyin ci log yin no //
analyzed: de 'dzin pa yang phyin ci log yin no //
translated: And the apprehension of that is mistaken.

original: de nyid kyi phyir smig rgyu la chur shes pa ni dngos po nyid la yang slu ba'i phyir tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir smig rgyu la chur shes pa ni dngos po nyid la yang slu ba'i phyir tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: For that very reason, the cognition of water in a mirage is not a valid cognition because it is deceptive even with regard to the thing itself.

original: smig rgyu ma bzung na der gyur ba'i dngos po nyid ma bzung ba'i phyir dang chu'i dngos po nyid bzung ba nyid kyang de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir te dngos po med na de yang med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: smig rgyu ma bzung na der gyur ba'i dngos po nyid ma bzung ba'i phyir dang chu'i dngos po nyid bzung ba nyid kyang de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir te dngos po med na de yang med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If one does not apprehend the mirage, one does not apprehend the entity that is the mirage, and the entity of water that is apprehended is not the nature of the mirage, because if the entity does not exist, that also does not exist.

original: reg pa la sogs pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la snang ba ma yin pa nges na gzungs nyid nges par rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: reg pa la sogs pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la snang ba ma yin pa nges na gzungs nyid nges par rtogs pa yin no //
translated: If contact, etc., are not the appearance of visual consciousness, then the apprehension of the mirage is the realization of the water.

original: gal te dkar po'i dngos po nyid bzung mod kyi 'on kyang kha dog gi cha la 'khrul par zad do //
analyzed: gal te dkar po'i dngos po nyid bzung mod kyi 'on kyang kha dog gi cha la 'khrul par zad do //
translated: Even if the entity of the white thing is apprehended, still there is error in the aspect of color.

original: dbyibs kyi cha la ni mi slu ste /
analyzed: dbyibs kyi cha la ni mi slu ste /
translated: But there is no error in the aspect of shape.

original: dper na sngon po'i shes pa sngon po'i cha la mi slu la /
analyzed: dper na sngon po'i shes pa sngon po'i cha la mi slu la /
translated: For example, the cognition of blue is not erroneous with respect to the aspect of blue,

original: skad cig ma'i cha la ni slu ba'i phyir cig shos kyi mngon sum ltar tshad ma ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: skad cig ma'i cha la ni slu ba'i phyir cig shos kyi mngon sum ltar tshad ma ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: but it is erroneous with respect to the aspect of momentariness. Therefore, like the other direct perception, it is not a valid cognition.

original: tha dad par rtogs pa yang ldog pa'i bye brag gis yin no zhe na /
analyzed: tha dad par rtogs pa yang ldog pa'i bye brag gis yin no zhe na /
translated: And the cognition of difference is due to the difference of exclusion.

original: smras pa / sngon po'i shes pa la sngon po snang ba na skad cig ma nyid kyi don byed pa la ni de las tha dad pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: smras pa / sngon po'i shes pa la sngon po snang ba na skad cig ma nyid kyi don byed pa la ni de las tha dad pa med pa yin no //
translated: Objection: When a cognition of blue appears, the object that is momentary is not different from that.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mthong ba'i rang bzhin gyi cha la 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan srid pa'i phyir dang / de las tha dad pa med pa'i phyir skad cig ma nyid ni de bzung nas bzung ba yin par brjod do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mthong ba'i rang bzhin gyi cha la 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan srid pa'i phyir dang / de las tha dad pa med pa'i phyir skad cig ma nyid ni de bzung nas bzung ba yin par brjod do //
translated: Therefore, since it is possible that the cause of error exists in the part that has the nature of seeing, and since it is not different from that, momentariness is said to be apprehended when that is apprehended.

original: 'dir ni dung ser por snang ba'i shes pa la don byed par nus pa'i rang bzhin 'ga' yang snang ba med pa'i phyir gang gis na dkar po'i rang bzhin du gzung ba nges par ma zin pa na shes pa gzhan gyis nges par gzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir ni dung ser por snang ba'i shes pa la don byed par nus pa'i rang bzhin 'ga' yang snang ba med pa'i phyir gang gis na dkar po'i rang bzhin du gzung ba nges par ma zin pa na shes pa gzhan gyis nges par gzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, however, since a cognition to which a yellow conch appears does not at all appear to have the nature of the ability to perform a function, how could the apprehension of a white nature that is not ascertained be ascertained by another cognition?

original: re zhig ser po nyid ni de las gzhan pa @213b kho na'o //
analyzed: re zhig ser po nyid ni de las gzhan pa @213b kho na'o //
translated: Yellowness is only different from that.

original: dbyibs kyang don byed pa'i nus pas gang gi phyir dkar po dang / tha mi dad par 'gyur /
analyzed: dbyibs kyang don byed pa'i nus pas gang gi phyir dkar po dang / tha mi dad par 'gyur /
translated: And how could shape be not different from white, since it is not the ability to perform a function?

original: nus pa tha mi dad pa nyid kyang sngar dpyad zin to //
analyzed: nus pa tha mi dad pa nyid kyang sngar dpyad zin to //
translated: The non-difference of the potency has already been examined.

original: de'i phyir ser po'i shes pa la snang ba ni sngon po'i rang bzhin ltar yod pa ma yin na /
analyzed: de'i phyir ser po'i shes pa la snang ba ni sngon po'i rang bzhin ltar yod pa ma yin na /
translated: Therefore, since the appearance in the cognition of yellow does not exist as the nature of blue,üîΩhow can it be imagined as the nature of white, which is the object of activity, just like momentariness?

original: ji ltar skad cig ma nyid bzhin du don byed pa'i dkar po'i bdag nyid du brtag / gzhan yang snang ba'i sngon po'i rnam pa ni skad cig ma nyid dang mi 'gal zhing //
analyzed: ji ltar skad cig ma nyid bzhin du don byed pa'i dkar po'i bdag nyid du brtag / gzhan yang snang ba'i sngon po'i rnam pa ni skad cig ma nyid dang mi 'gal zhing //
translated: Moreover, the aspect of blue in the appearance is not contradictory to momentariness.

original: skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid snang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid snang ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that the non-momentariness appears in the appearance,

original: dus yun ring po dang bcas pa'i don mngon sum la snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus yun ring po dang bcas pa'i don mngon sum la snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the object with a long duration does not appear in the direct perception.

original: de'i stobs kyis bskyed pa'i nges pa'i shes pas gzhag pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i stobs kyis bskyed pa'i nges pa'i shes pas gzhag pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not established by the ascertaining cognition produced by the power of that.

original: de la ni 'gal ba med pa'i skad cig ma nyid yod par 'thad kyi //
analyzed: de la ni 'gal ba med pa'i skad cig ma nyid yod par 'thad kyi //
translated: In that case, it is tenable that momentariness, which is not contradictory to that, exists.

original: dkar po ma yin pa'i ser po la sogs pa spangs nas gnas pa'i dkar po'i rang bzhin yod pa nyid ni ma mthong yang //
analyzed: dkar po ma yin pa'i ser po la sogs pa spangs nas gnas pa'i dkar po'i rang bzhin yod pa nyid ni ma mthong yang //
translated: But the existence of the nature of white, which remains after abandoning the non-white yellow and so on, is not seen.

original: mthong ba'i ser po'i rang bzhin gyi dbyibs yin par rtogs pa ni chu dang me tha mi dad par rtogs pa bzhin du don med pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba'i ser po'i rang bzhin gyi dbyibs yin par rtogs pa ni chu dang me tha mi dad par rtogs pa bzhin du don med pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The realization that the shape of the color blue is the nature of the blue that is seen is meaningless, just like the realization that water and fire are not different.

original: de'i phyir don byed pa gang las tha dad pa med pa de ni de'i bdag nyid kho nas yod pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir don byed pa gang las tha dad pa med pa de ni de'i bdag nyid kho nas yod pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, that which is not different from that which performs a function exists only by way of its own nature.

original: de'i bdag nyid du yod pa yang de mngon sum gyis bzung na de dag kyang bzung ba yin la /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid du yod pa yang de mngon sum gyis bzung na de dag kyang bzung ba yin la /
translated: And if that which exists by way of its own nature is apprehended by direct perception, then those that are of the same nature as that are also apprehended.

original: ma bzung na ma bzung ba yin no zhes bya ba ni tshad ma'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: ma bzung na ma bzung ba yin no zhes bya ba ni tshad ma'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: But if they are not apprehended, then they are not apprehended. This is the result of valid knowledge.

original: 'o na ji ltar mgal me la 'khor lo snang ba'i shes pa'i don yod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar mgal me la 'khor lo snang ba'i shes pa'i don yod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Well then, how could the object of the consciousness to which a wheel appears on the basis of a firebrand not exist?

original: kha dog 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin ni de la snang ba'i phyir dang / dbyibs kyang don la nye bar mi mkho bas dor ba dang blang ba dag la khyad par med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: kha dog 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin ni de la snang ba'i phyir dang / dbyibs kyang don la nye bar mi mkho bas dor ba dang blang ba dag la khyad par med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the nature of the clear light of the color appears to it, and because shape is not necessary for the object, there is no difference between that which is to be rejected and that which is to be accepted.

original: dper na ser por shes pa bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: dper na ser por shes pa bzhin no zhe na /
translated: For example, it is like the consciousness of yellow.

original: yang 'phros pa 'di gad las byung //
analyzed: yang 'phros pa 'di gad las byung //
translated: Moreover, shape arises from the elements.

original: gang gi phyir dbyibs sngon po la sogs pa don byed pa du ma'i thun mong ba ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir dbyibs sngon po la sogs pa don byed pa du ma'i thun mong ba ni /
translated: Because blue and so on, which are the objects of the eye consciousness, are the common locus of many functional things,

original: de la brten cing de'i rang bzhin du yod kyi //
analyzed: de la brten cing de'i rang bzhin du yod kyi //
translated: they exist in dependence on that and have that as their nature.

original: tha dad pa ni ma yin pa de'i phyir dkar po'i rang bzhin de dang dbye ba med par 'jug pa'i dbyibs kyang btang bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: tha dad pa ni ma yin pa de'i phyir dkar po'i rang bzhin de dang dbye ba med par 'jug pa'i dbyibs kyang btang bar 'gyur te /
translated: But they are not different from it. Therefore, shape, which is not different from that nature of white, would also be abandoned.

original: dngos po nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: dngos po nyid bzhin no //
translated: It would be like the thing itself.

original: gzung ba gang yin pa de ni gzhan la brten pa nyid yin pas //
analyzed: gzung ba gang yin pa de ni gzhan la brten pa nyid yin pas //
translated: That which is apprehended is dependent on another.

original: de yod na yod la /
analyzed: de yod na yod la /
translated: If that exists, it exists.

original: med na ni med pa yin no //
analyzed: med na ni med pa yin no //
translated: If it does not exist, it does not exist.

original: de la bsams nas ni shes pa yod pa 'dzin par byed pa zhes brjod pa ma yin la /üîΩde tsam gyis kyang sngon po la sogs pa'i dngos po de dbyibs la ltos pa med par gzung bar bya ba @214a * //
analyzed: de la bsams nas ni shes pa yod pa 'dzin par byed pa zhes brjod pa ma yin la / de tsam gyis kyang sngon po la sogs pa'i dngos po de dbyibs la ltos pa med par gzung bar bya ba @214a * //
translated: Thinking of that, it is said that consciousness apprehends the existence of that.

original: yin no zhes brjod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yin no zhes brjod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But it is not said that blue and so on are apprehended without depending on shape.

original: 'di ltar sngon po'i rdul phra rab ni lus can nyid kyis phan tshun gyi rang bzhin gyis yongs su spangs nas skye ba la bum pa la sogs pa bzhin du dbyibs kyi rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis 'ga' zhig gi don byed pa ni de kho na ltar 'dzinüîΩpa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar sngon po'i rdul phra rab ni lus can nyid kyis phan tshun gyi rang bzhin gyis yongs su spangs nas skye ba la bum pa la sogs pa bzhin du dbyibs kyi rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis 'ga' zhig gi don byed pa ni de kho na ltar 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: One apprehends them as having the aspect of a certain shape, and they perform a function in that way.

original: de ltar snang ba de dag la phyogs kyi rjes su 'gro ba gcig tu brtags pa'i rags pa ni don du ma snang ba'i chos yin gyi dngos po'i rang bzhin ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar snang ba de dag la phyogs kyi rjes su 'gro ba gcig tu brtags pa'i rags pa ni don du ma snang ba'i chos yin gyi dngos po'i rang bzhin ni ma yin no //
translated: The gross, which is imagined to be a single entity that pervades those appearances, is a phenomenon that appears as a multiplicity, but it is not the nature of a real entity.

original: spyi'i don gyi tshul la mang po rnams kyi rang bzhin la de lta bu'i dbyibs su brten pa du mar yang med pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: spyi'i don gyi tshul la mang po rnams kyi rang bzhin la de lta bu'i dbyibs su brten pa du mar yang med pa ni ma yin te /
translated: In the method of the meaning of the universal, the nature of many is not nonexistent as a multiplicity that is based on such a shape.

original: de lta bu'i rang bzhin du gyur pa ni yod par mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rang bzhin du gyur pa ni yod par mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not contradictory that such a nature exists.

original: de ni mang po rnams kyi rang bzhin yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de ni mang po rnams kyi rang bzhin yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is the nature of many,

original: de ci du ma'i dngos po thams cad gcig yin nam /
analyzed: de ci du ma'i dngos po thams cad gcig yin nam /
translated: is it that all things that are multiple are one?

original: de'i phyir ji lta bu'i dbyibs dang ldan pas don byed par nus pa'i dbyibs de btang na dngos po nyid yongs su btang ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir ji lta bu'i dbyibs dang ldan pas don byed par nus pa'i dbyibs de btang na dngos po nyid yongs su btang ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, if the shape that is capable of performing a function by possessing a certain shape is abandoned, then the thing itself is completely abandoned,

original: dbyibs de ltar gzung ba de mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbyibs de ltar gzung ba de mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because when that shape is apprehended in that way, it is not apprehended.

original: des ni dbyibs tha dad pa can gyi 'khor lo snang ba na snang ba la dbyibs gzhan dang ldan pa'i mgal me med dpa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des ni dbyibs tha dad pa can gyi 'khor lo snang ba na snang ba la dbyibs gzhan dang ldan pa'i mgal me med dpa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because when a wheel with a different shape appears, there is no firebrand that appears to possess a different shape.

original: phyogs kyi cha khyab pa res pa'i khyad par dang ldan par mthong ba'i 'khor lo don byed nus pa yang d'i la snang ba med pa yin no //
analyzed: phyogs kyi cha khyab pa res pa'i khyad par dang ldan par mthong ba'i 'khor lo don byed nus pa yang d'i la snang ba med pa yin no //
translated: Also, a wheel that is seen to be endowed with a particular pervasiveness of directional parts is not capable of performing a function.

original: de nyid kyi phyir ljon shing 'gro bar 'dzin pa don byed pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir ljon shing 'gro bar 'dzin pa don byed pa yin te /
translated: For that very reason, the apprehension of a moving tree is capable of performing a function,

original: de la snang bar nges pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar gyur ba ni 'bras bu sgrub par ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la snang bar nges pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar gyur ba ni 'bras bu sgrub par ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is seen that whatever appears in that way becomes like that, but the establishment of the effect is not seen.

original: gang zhig don byed nus pa'i rang bzhin la 'khrul pa med pa de ni 'khrul pa med pa yin pa des na mngon sum ma yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig don byed nus pa'i rang bzhin la 'khrul pa med pa de ni 'khrul pa med pa yin pa des na mngon sum ma yin no //
translated: That which is not erroneous with regard to the nature of an object that is able to perform a function is non-erroneous. Therefore, it is not direct perception.

original: des na chos gang mthong ba nyid 'bras bu byed pa'i dngos po mthong ba yin ba de btang na dngos po btang ba yin no zhes bya ba ni tshad ma'i don to //
analyzed: des na chos gang mthong ba nyid 'bras bu byed pa'i dngos po mthong ba yin ba de btang na dngos po btang ba yin no zhes bya ba ni tshad ma'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of valid cognition is that when one sees any phenomenon, one sees the thing that is the cause of the result. If one abandons that, one abandons the thing.

original: ji ltar lhag par zhen pa mi thob pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ji ltar lhag par zhen pa mi thob pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it does not obtain the object as it is conceived,

original: mi bden pa'i don can de rjes su dpag pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: mi bden pa'i don can de rjes su dpag pa yang ma yin te /
translated: it is not inference either, because it has an unreal object.

original: des na tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: des na tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not valid cognition.

original: gal te de ltar na 'jig rten na gsal ba tha dad pa la rnam par dbye ba med par dper na thag ring po nas ne'u gseng la sogs pa la ljang gu'i mdog gcig tu 'dzin pa dang / de bzhin du shin tu gsal ba'i kha dog la yang mi gsal bar 'dzin pa dper na lha khang dkar po la sogs pa rdul gyis g-yogs pa @214b lta bu dang /
analyzed: gal te de ltar na 'jig rten na gsal ba tha dad pa la rnam par dbye ba med par dper na thag ring po nas ne'u gseng la sogs pa la ljang gu'i mdog gcig tu 'dzin pa dang / de bzhin du shin tu gsal ba'i kha dog la yang mi gsal bar 'dzin pa dper na lha khang dkar po la sogs pa rdul gyis g-yogs pa @214b lta bu dang /
translated: and likewise, one would apprehend a very clear color as unclear, for example, a white temple, etc. as covered with dust.üîΩAnd likewise, one would apprehend something that possesses another valid cognition as possessing a contradictory valid cognition, for example, one would apprehend a man, etc. from a distance as a post,

original: de bzhin du tshad ma gzhan dang ldan pa la 'gal ba'i tshad ma ldan pa dper na thag ring po nas mi la sogs pa lta bu dang / de bzhin du yi ge gsal ba'i sgra la gzhan du yongs su gcod pa dper na chod pa na 'dod pa lta bu'i zhe'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshad ma gzhan dang ldan pa la 'gal ba'i tshad ma ldan pa dper na thag ring po nas mi la sogs pa lta bu dang / de bzhin du yi ge gsal ba'i sgra la gzhan du yongs su gcod pa dper na chod pa na 'dod pa lta bu'i zhe'o //
translated: and likewise, one would apprehend a sound that is clear as a letter as otherwise indeterminate, for example, as a wall.

original: de dag ni bden pa'i rang bzhin yin te /
analyzed: de dag ni bden pa'i rang bzhin yin te /
translated: But these are not true in nature,

original: don byed pa la nye bar sbyor bar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don byed pa la nye bar sbyor bar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are seen to be applied to the performance of a function.

original: de'i phyir tshul 'dis nye ba dang ring ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas mngon sum 'ga' zhig kyang don byed pa'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa ma 'khal rul bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir tshul 'dis nye ba dang ring ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas mngon sum 'ga' zhig kyang don byed pa'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa ma 'khal rul bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by this method, even some direct perception, by the division of near and far, etc., does not hold the nature of the object‚Äôs function, and so it is not spoiled.

original: de nyid kyi phyir phi rol gyi don spong ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir phi rol gyi don spong ba yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it is the rejection of external objects.

original: phyir rol gyi tshul la yang slob dpon gyis lam 'dir bzhud pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: phyir rol gyi tshul la yang slob dpon gyis lam 'dir bzhud pa ma yin nam /
translated: In the external system, too, is this path not followed by the Acarya?

original: des na rnam pa 'di lta bu yang tshad ma ma yin pa'am //
analyzed: des na rnam pa 'di lta bu yang tshad ma ma yin pa'am //
translated: Therefore, this kind of form is not valid cognition.

original: dbyibs tsam la phyin ci log pa yang tshad mar 'gyur ba'i phyir 'dir brdas nas 'thor ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dbyibs tsam la phyin ci log pa yang tshad mar 'gyur ba'i phyir 'dir brdas nas 'thor ba yin no zhe na /
translated: Or, even the error of mere shape is valid cognition, and so here it is scattered by convention.

original: bden te / dbyibs la mngon par zhen ba ni cung zad kyang med kyi //
analyzed: bden te / dbyibs la mngon par zhen ba ni cung zad kyang med kyi //
translated: True, but there is not the slightest clinging to shape.

original: 'on kyang gang gis don byed nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dzin pa de 'dra ba'i shes pa de ni de la phyin ci ma log pa bzhin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang gang gis don byed nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dzin pa de 'dra ba'i shes pa de ni de la phyin ci ma log pa bzhin no //
translated: Nevertheless, the consciousness that holds the object‚Äôs function as it is is not erroneous with respect to that.

analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na ci @215a * //

analyzed: nye ba na 'dug pa'i bar chad dang bcas pa'i lo ma dmigs pa'i phyir bar chad dang bcas pa nyid du 'dzin la /
translated: Because the leaf that is near and has an obstruction is observed, it is grasped as having an obstruction.

translated: Therefore, when one is far away, one sees the color of the object without the intervening objects, and when one is near, one sees the object with the intervening objects.

analyzed: gzhan na 'dug pa la ma nges pa nyid kyi shes pa'i snang ba la ston nas 'khul ba yin gyi 'dres pa mthong ba ni ma yin no //

analyzed: dper na dngul gyi cha cung zad dang ma 'dres pa'i gser la /

analyzed: @215b dngul gyi cha mi snag bar ser po nyid mdog mi bzang bar snang ba bzhin no //

original: 'dres pa bzung ba na de ltar snang ba yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dres pa bzung ba na de ltar snang ba yin gyi /

analyzed: dper na rta rmig gis brtul ba'i sa rdul langs pa des gos pa'i kho dog bzhin no //

original: gal te rnam par byed pa don ma yin nam //
analyzed: gal te rnam par byed pa don ma yin nam //

analyzed: de las 'das na ni gzung ba ma nges par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If it is beyond that, then the object is not ascertained.

original: de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: gang gi phyir bdag nyid gsal ba'i rgyu'i don te rang gi sems la rang gi dngos po'i gzung ba'i don yod pa ma yin par gtod par byed kyi gzhan ni ma yin no //

analyzed: don gzhan dang 'brel pas ni dbyibs kyi khyad par can gyi dngos po de nyid gnyis ka'i bdag nyid can nam /

analyzed: ljon shing 'gro bar shes pa bden pa'i don can du 'gyur //

analyzed: kha dog tu 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
translated: It becomes a color that is to be ascertained.

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir nges par brtags pa'i kha dog 'dzin pa na tha dad par ma byas pa'i phyir mi gsal bar snang ba yin te bstan pa'i dpe bzhin nam /
translated: Therefore, when one apprehends a color that is ascertained, it appears unclear because it is not differentiated, like the example of the teaching,

analyzed: rdul gyis bsgribs pa'i kha dog bzung ba na rdul dang 'dres pa'i kha dog mthong pa bzhin no //
translated: or like the apprehension of a color that is obscured by dust, one sees a color mixed with dust.

analyzed: de'i phyir mi gsal bar snang ba yang dngos po 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the apprehension of an unclear appearance is the apprehension of an entity.

translated: For example, a cognition that is a direct perception that is nondeceptive with regard to itself, which has as its object an appearance that is inseparable from the form of an imaginary form.

analyzed: thag ring po na gnas pa ni 'dzin par mi gsal ba'i sdang ba'i shes pa yang de bzhin no //
translated: The cognition of hatred that is not clear with regard to the object that is far away is also like that.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i mi gsal bar snang ba las don gzhan dang 'dres pa'i sngar bshad pa'i don de thob pa na 'dzin pa'i shes pa dngos po'i yul can ma yin pa ni rgyu med pa yin no zhes pa ni rang bzhin no //

translated: When the object that was previously explained is obtained, mixed with something else, from the unclear appearance, the cognition of apprehension is not the object of a real entity, because it is without a cause. This is the nature.

analyzed: de'i phyir yul med pa 'ba' zhig mi gsal bar snang ba ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, it is not the case that only the objectless appears unclearly.

analyzed: 'on kyang yul gzhan dang 'dres pa yang yin no zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'o ;

analyzed: kha dog btang na ni kha khyer gyi mthar thug pa na gnas pa'i rdul gyi tshogs nyid snang ba yin la /
translated: When the color is abandoned, the collection of atoms that is located at the end of the rim appears.

translated: The shape of the atoms is the same as the shape of the object, and so the shape of the object is inferred from the color of the atoms in the middle of the object.

translated: This explains how one infers the shape of an object at night when it is hidden by darkness.üîΩFor example, one infers the presence of a rope in a certain place from the fact that one has grasped a rope with a particular shape.

analyzed: de bzhin du phan tshun gyi rang bzhin dang / yul yongs su spangs nas /
translated: In the same way, one infers the shape of an object from the color of the atoms that make up the object.

original: skyes pa'i rdul phra rab rnams la /üîΩlus can yin pas yul gyi khyad par gyis khyab pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dbyibs ni yod pa nyid kyi /
analyzed: skyes pa'i rdul phra rab rnams la / lus can yin pas yul gyi khyad par gyis khyab pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dbyibs ni yod pa nyid kyi /

original: tshad gcig ni mi 'thad do //
analyzed: tshad gcig ni mi 'thad do //

original: rnam @216b pa thams cad du chen po 'am chung ngu yang rung ste /
analyzed: rnam @216b pa thams cad du chen po 'am chung ngu yang rung ste /

analyzed: gang zhig phyogs kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i tshad ni yod pa ma yin te /

original: des na de ni snang bar 'gyur ba yin gyi /
analyzed: des na de ni snang bar 'gyur ba yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, it is an appearance,

original: dngos por 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos por 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
translated: but it is not an entity.

original: 'di ltar mtshungs pa mang po bar mchod pa snang ba rnams la /
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshungs pa mang po bar mchod pa snang ba rnams la /
translated: Thus, in the case of many similar things that are seen,

original: lus can nyid kyi phyogs kyi rnam par dbye ba sngon du 'gro ba can phyi rol ma yin pa'i tshad kyang snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus can nyid kyi phyogs kyi rnam par dbye ba sngon du 'gro ba can phyi rol ma yin pa'i tshad kyang snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the measure of the external is not seen to precede the division of the direction of the body.

original: de yang btags par yod pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang btags par yod pa yin no //
translated: And that is imputedly existent.

original: de la thag ring po nas ches mang po dngos po mthong bas khyab pa rnams las mthong ba'i cha chung dus khyab pa gcig mthong ba na shes pa las tshad snang bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de la thag ring po nas ches mang po dngos po mthong bas khyab pa rnams las mthong ba'i cha chung dus khyab pa gcig mthong ba na shes pa las tshad snang bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: When a small part of the pervasion is seen from among the pervasions of many things seen from a distance, the measure of the cognition appears.

original: tshad de dngos po'i chos ma yin yang rdzas nyung du la ma 'khrul bas mang po la tshad gzhan dang ldan par mthong ba na /
analyzed: tshad de dngos po'i chos ma yin yang rdzas nyung du la ma 'khrul bas mang po la tshad gzhan dang ldan par mthong ba na /
translated: Although that measure is not a property of the thing, it is unmistaken with regard to the small substance. When the other measure is seen in the many,

original: mang po ma yin pa'i rdzas mthong bas dmigs par byed pa ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: mang po ma yin pa'i rdzas mthong bas dmigs par byed pa ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: How can one see a substance that is not many and make it the object of observation?

analyzed: mang po la ni nyung dur 'dzin par 'jug pa phyin ci ma log pa zhes bya ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: It is not the case that the engagement in apprehending many as few is called ‚Äúnon-mistaken.‚Äù

original: gal te tshad gzhan du sgro btags nas 'dzin pa nyung du nyid nges par bzung ba ni bden na /üîΩ'on kyang nyung du mang po ni so sor nges pa nyid kyi yul gyi khyad par gnon pa'i bya ba dang ldan pa'i phyir thag ring po nas tshad chung ngu bzung yang mang po'i yul khyab pa'i dngos po mthong ba de na tshad gzhan dang ldan yang khyad
analyzed: gal te tshad gzhan du sgro btags nas 'dzin pa nyung du nyid nges par bzung ba ni bden na / 'on kyang nyung du mang po ni so sor nges pa nyid kyi yul gyi khyad par gnon pa'i bya ba dang ldan pa'i phyir thag ring po nas tshad chung ngu bzung yang mang po'i yul khyab pa'i dngos po mthong ba de na tshad gzhan dang ldan yang khyad
translated: If it is true that one apprehends a few by superimposing another measure,

original: par can gyi yul khyab pa'i dngos po nyung ngur bzung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: par can gyi yul khyab pa'i dngos po nyung ngur bzung ba ma yin no //
translated: then even though one apprehends a small measure from a distance, one sees an entity that pervades a large area. Therefore, even though it has another measure, it is not apprehended as few, an entity that pervades a special area.

original: gal te yang ji ltar 'grib pa de ltar bya ba nyams na ni de'i tshe dngos po gzhan gzung ba'i phyir ji lta ba nyid ma yin pa snang ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: gal te yang ji ltar 'grib pa de ltar bya ba nyams na ni de'i tshe dngos po gzhan gzung ba'i phyir ji lta ba nyid ma yin pa snang ba nyid yin no //
translated: If, as you say, the object‚Äôs size is diminished, then it is not the same object that is perceived, because it is a different object that is apprehended.

original: de'i phyir thag ring po nas tshad chung ngu dang ldan par snang yang dngos po 'dzin pa yin no /
analyzed: de'i phyir thag ring po nas tshad chung ngu dang ldan par snang yang dngos po 'dzin pa yin no /
translated: Therefore, even though a small object is perceived at a distance, it is still apprehended as a real object.

original: 'o na ci'i phyir thag ring por mya ngam dag na chung ngu la tshad gzhan dang ldan par 'dzin pa la 'khrul ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci'i phyir thag ring por mya ngam dag na chung ngu la tshad gzhan dang ldan par 'dzin pa la 'khrul ba yin zhe na /
translated: But why is there a mistake in apprehending a small object at a distance as having a different size?

original: gang gi phyir de la tshad chen por 'dzin pa na yul gang khyab pa de ni dngos po yod pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de la tshad chen por 'dzin pa na yul gang khyab pa de ni dngos po yod pa ma yin zhing /
translated: Because when a large size is apprehended, the object that is pervaded by that size does not exist.

original: der gyur pa 'dzin pa de'i yul gyi rang bzhin ma yin pa la de'i yul gyi rang bzhin can du 'dzin pa'i phyir 'khrul ba'i shes pa yin gyi /
analyzed: der gyur pa 'dzin pa de'i yul gyi rang bzhin ma yin pa la de'i yul gyi rang bzhin can du 'dzin pa'i phyir 'khrul ba'i shes pa yin gyi /
translated: The object that is apprehended as having that size is not the nature of the object‚Äôs domain. Therefore, it is a mistaken consciousness that apprehends the nature of the object‚Äôs domain as having that size.

original: gzhan la ni dngos po de gang la med pa der yang 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan la ni dngos po de gang la med pa der yang 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But in the other case, the object is not apprehended as having a size that it does not have.

original: sgra yang dbang po ma nyams pa nye bar 'dug pa dang / sgra yang re re nas ma 'khrugs par thos na ni yi ge'i cha thams cad yul du 'gyur te /üîΩskad cig @217a * //
analyzed: sgra yang dbang po ma nyams pa nye bar 'dug pa dang / sgra yang re re nas ma 'khrugs par thos na ni yi ge'i cha thams cad yul du 'gyur te / skad cig @217a * //
translated: If the sound is not damaged and the sense faculty is present, and if the sound is heard without confusion, then all the parts of the letters are the object.üîΩIf the sound is damaged, or the sense faculty is damaged, or the sound is confused, then the object is not complete.

original: so so gnas dang byed pa phrad pa tha dad pa las bar chad dang bcas pa mngon pa yin no //
analyzed: so so gnas dang byed pa phrad pa tha dad pa las bar chad dang bcas pa mngon pa yin no //
translated: The object is incomplete because the place and the action are not present, and because there is an interruption.

original: de nyid kyi phyir yi ge'i rnam pa ma bzung bas na zur chag pa dang / ring du 'phos pa ni thag ring po na gnas pa dang / rna ba nyams pa'i yul yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir yi ge'i rnam pa ma bzung bas na zur chag pa dang / ring du 'phos pa ni thag ring po na gnas pa dang / rna ba nyams pa'i yul yin no //
translated: For this very reason, when the form of the letter is not grasped, the garbled and the transposed are the objects of the deaf.

original: ca co'i gnas skabs su yang gnas dang byed pa phrad pa'i khyad par las 'khrugs par skyes pa na snga ma bzhin yul yin no //
analyzed: ca co'i gnas skabs su yang gnas dang byed pa phrad pa'i khyad par las 'khrugs par skyes pa na snga ma bzhin yul yin no //
translated: Even in the case of babbling, when it arises in confusion due to the particularities of the place and action, it is the object as before.

original: 'di dag la yang tshad ma ni /
analyzed: 'di dag la yang tshad ma ni /
translated: Here too, the valid cognition is

original: thag ring po kho na nas yin no //
analyzed: thag ring po kho na nas yin no //
translated: only from a distance.

original: thag nye ba la ni 'di lta bu'i rigs can yul gzhan la 'jug pa rang bzhin gzhan gyi yul can tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: thag nye ba la ni 'di lta bu'i rigs can yul gzhan la 'jug pa rang bzhin gzhan gyi yul can tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: When close, such a type of cognition that engages another object is not a valid cognition that has another nature as its object.

original: gang yang dung yod pa nyid la de'i shes pa skye ba de ni 'khrul ba rnams rgyu nges pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang yang dung yod pa nyid la de'i shes pa skye ba de ni 'khrul ba rnams rgyu nges pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And the arising of the cognition of the existence of the conch is a delusion, because the causes of delusions are definite.

original: zla ba gnyis su snang ba la sogs pa'i phyin ci log gi shes pa ni yul dang dus la sogs pa rgyu'i khyad par la ltos nas 'jug pa nyid do //
analyzed: zla ba gnyis su snang ba la sogs pa'i phyin ci log gi shes pa ni yul dang dus la sogs pa rgyu'i khyad par la ltos nas 'jug pa nyid do //
translated: And the erroneous cognition of the appearance of two moons, etc., occurs in dependence on the particular causes, such as the object, time, etc.

original: dper na sprin med pa'i nam mkha'i phyogs zla ba dang 'brel ba'i phyogs su zla ba gnyis pa'i shes pa yin no //
analyzed: dper na sprin med pa'i nam mkha'i phyogs zla ba dang 'brel ba'i phyogs su zla ba gnyis pa'i shes pa yin no //
translated: For example, in the direction of the cloudless sky, the cognition of a second moon occurs in the direction associated with the moon.

original: de la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las zla ba ni rab rib bzhin du rgyu yin gyi /
analyzed: de la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las zla ba ni rab rib bzhin du rgyu yin gyi /
translated: And from the positive and negative concomitance, the moon is the cause, like the eye disease,

original: rang gi rnam par 'jog pa mi nus pas na yul ni ma yin pa de bzhin du dung dkar po yang yin no //
analyzed: rang gi rnam par 'jog pa mi nus pas na yul ni ma yin pa de bzhin du dung dkar po yang yin no //
translated: but not the object, because it is not able to establish its own form. In the same way, the white conch is also like that.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gal te de lta bu'i rnam par shes pa zla ba gcig gam yul gcig na gnas pa'i shing la sogs pa ma mthong ba rjes su 'dod pa de'i tshe 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gal te de lta bu'i rnam par shes pa zla ba gcig gam yul gcig na gnas pa'i shing la sogs pa ma mthong ba rjes su 'dod pa de'i tshe 'gal ba med do //
translated: Therefore, if one accepts that such consciousness is not seeing the trees, etc. that are in the same place and time, then there is no contradiction.

original: gang gi phyir nges pa'i 'jug yul thob par byed pa'i phyir tshad ma yin pa de'i phyir log pa'i shes pas don mi 'thob po //
analyzed: gang gi phyir nges pa'i 'jug yul thob par byed pa'i phyir tshad ma yin pa de'i phyir log pa'i shes pas don mi 'thob po //
translated: Because it is a valid cognition in that it causes one to obtain the engaged object, therefore the object is not obtained by a mistaken consciousness.

original: 'di ltar gal te 'jug pa'i yul thob par byed na ni de'i tshe yang dag pa'i shes pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar gal te 'jug pa'i yul thob par byed na ni de'i tshe yang dag pa'i shes pa nyid yin la /
translated: Thus, if it causes one to obtain the engaged object, then it is a correct consciousness.

original: de thob par mi byed na yang ji ltar don thob pa yin /
analyzed: de thob par mi byed na yang ji ltar don thob pa yin /
translated: If it does not cause one to obtain it, then how is the object obtained?

original: de'i phyir sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis gzhan du na de'i bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis gzhan du na de'i bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, as explained earlier, it is not that, because it lacks the activity of that.

original: des na gang log pa'i shes pa yin pa de ni zhen par byas pa'i don thob pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: des na gang log pa'i shes pa yin pa de ni zhen par byas pa'i don thob pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
translated: Thus, that which is a mistaken consciousness is not the cause of obtaining the object that is the basis of adherence.

original: dper na smig rgyu la chur shes pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na smig rgyu la chur shes pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the consciousness that apprehends a mirage as water.

original: de bzhin du rtsod pa'i gzhir gyur pa yang log pa'i shes pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du rtsod pa'i gzhir gyur pa yang log pa'i shes pa yin no //
translated: Likewise, the cognition that is the basis of a dispute is a false cognition.

original: don thob pa'i rgyu nyid ni yang dag pa'i shes pas khyab pa yin te /
analyzed: don thob pa'i rgyu nyid ni yang dag pa'i shes pas khyab pa yin te /
translated: The cause of attaining the object is pervaded by being a true cognition,

original: rgyu mtshan gzhan dang 'brel ba'i yang dag pa'i shes pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gzhan dang 'brel ba'i yang dag pa'i shes pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no other cause that is connected with a true cognition.

original: gal te the tshom gyi @217b shes pas kyang mngon par 'dod pa thob na de yang dag pa'i shes pa nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te the tshom gyi @217b shes pas kyang mngon par 'dod pa thob na de yang dag pa'i shes pa nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If one attains the desired object by a doubting cognition, then that is not a true cognition.

original: de las ni don mi thob ste /
analyzed: de las ni don mi thob ste /
translated: One does not attain the object from that,

original: gang gi phyir the tshom ni yod dam med ces gnyis ka la dmigs nas 'jug la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir the tshom ni yod dam med ces gnyis ka la dmigs nas 'jug la /
translated: because doubt engages by observing both, ‚ÄúIs it existent or nonexistent?‚Äù

analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa las ma gtogs pa'i ma nges pa'i dngos po yang 'jig rten na yod pa ma yin no //
translated: And in the world, there is no indeterminate entity apart from entity and nonentity.

original: de las ni zhugs pa las nges par byed pa thob pa'i rgyu'i tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: de las ni zhugs pa las nges par byed pa thob pa'i rgyu'i tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa yin no //
translated: From that, another valid knowledge that is the cause of attaining certainty from engagement is engaged.

original: de lta na ni 'o na sgra'am gzhan las kyang rung ste /
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na sgra'am gzhan las kyang rung ste /
translated: If that is so, then from sound or something else,

original: gang gi tshe rang gi ngang gis nges pa'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa skye ba de'i tshe don thob po snyam na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rang gi ngang gis nges pa'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa skye ba de'i tshe don thob po snyam na /
translated: But when a consciousness that is naturally ascertained arises, then the object is obtained.

original: de ltar ni mi rigs te gang gi phyir don gyi rang bzhin snang ba'i rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: de ltar ni mi rigs te gang gi phyir don gyi rang bzhin snang ba'i rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: That is not reasonable, because in that case, would a consciousness that is the appearance of the nature of the object arise,

original: de'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i rtogs par byed pa'i shes pa skyes bar 'gyur grang /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i rtogs par byed pa'i shes pa skyes bar 'gyur grang /
translated: or would a consciousness that is the apprehender of its nature arise?

analyzed: de la de snang ba'i rnam par shes pas gzung na ni snang ba la nges par 'jug pa nyid do //
translated: If it is apprehended by a consciousness that is the appearance of that object, then it is ascertained by the appearance itself.

original: rtog pa'i shes pa ni de rnam pa dang mi ldan pas rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir ji ltar nges par byed /
analyzed: rtog pa'i shes pa ni de rnam pa dang mi ldan pas rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir ji ltar nges par byed /
translated: But a conceptual consciousness does not have the aspect of that object, so how can it ascertain it, since it is without a reason?

original: de med na mi 'byung ba mthong na ni nges par rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de med na mi 'byung ba mthong na ni nges par rigs pa yin no //
translated: If it is seen to be invariably concomitant with that object, then it is reasonable that it ascertains it.

original: de'i phyir nges pa med par dngos po rtogs pa yang nges par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir cha gcig tu 'jug par 'dod kyang de ni the tshom gyi phyogs su rtogs so //

translated: Therefore, even if you assert that the realization of things is without ascertainment, since there is no reason to ascertain it, it is understood to be a case of doubt.

original: gang gi tshe du bar 'dod pa'i sbrang bu'i tshogs mthong ba las me la shes pa skyes pa de'i tshe gnyi ga la dmigs pa ma yin pa des na de ni mi slu ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe du bar 'dod pa'i sbrang bu'i tshogs mthong ba las me la shes pa skyes pa de'i tshe gnyi ga la dmigs pa ma yin pa des na de ni mi slu ba yin no zhe na /
translated: When fire is seen by a group of bees that desire smoke, and knowledge arises in them, at that time it is not based on both. Therefore it is nondeceptive.

original: du ba'i rgyu mtshan can gyi nges pa ni du ba yod na yod la /
analyzed: du ba'i rgyu mtshan can gyi nges pa ni du ba yod na yod la /
translated: The ascertainment that has smoke as its reason exists when smoke exists.

original: ma nges na yang the tshom nyid do snyam pas du ba'i rjes su 'brang bas yang dag pa'i du ba'i rang bzhin nges par ma rtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ma nges na yang the tshom nyid do snyam pas du ba'i rjes su 'brang bas yang dag pa'i du ba'i rang bzhin nges par ma rtogs pa'i phyir /
translated: If it is uncertain, it is just doubt. Therefore, since it does not realize the nature of smoke that is being pursued,

original: de ma nges pa'i yul nyid du gzhag pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: de ma nges pa'i yul nyid du gzhag pa ma yin nam /
translated: is it not the case that it is posited as an object that is not ascertained?

original: des na the tshom nyid do //
analyzed: des na the tshom nyid do //
translated: Therefore it is just doubt.

original: des na de'i rang bzhin bzung ba'am /
analyzed: des na de'i rang bzhin bzung ba'am /
translated: Therefore, it does not apprehend its nature.

original: de'i rang bzhin med na mi 'byung ba bzung ba kho na nges pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin med na mi 'byung ba bzung ba kho na nges pa yin no //
translated: If it does not exist, then the ascertainment is of the mere apprehension of that nature.
