analyzed: gzhan du ni ma nges pa'i yul can nyid kyis srid par brtags pa the tshom gyi rang bzhin shes pa yin no //
translated: Otherwise, it would be a cognition of the nature of doubt, which is a superimposition of possibility, since it would have an uncertain object.

original: gnyis ka'i bdag nyid kyi dngos po yang med pas thob par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gnyis ka'i bdag nyid kyi dngos po yang med pas thob par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: And since there is no entity that is the nature of both, it is not a cognition that obtains.

original: de nyid kyi phyir yang dag pa'i shes pas nges pa'i don thob pa des na 'bad pas ston par byed do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir yang dag pa'i shes pas nges pa'i don thob pa des na 'bad pas ston par byed do //
translated: Therefore, since the meaning of a text is ascertained by right cognition, one should teach it with effort.

original: gzhan du na @218a * //
analyzed: gzhan du na @218a * //
translated: Otherwise,

original: ni de bstan pa don med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ni de bstan pa don med par 'gyur te /
translated: the teaching would be pointless,

original: thob pa'i rgyu gzhan srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thob pa'i rgyu gzhan srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: since there would be other causes of obtaining.

original: de nyid kyi phyir nges pa smos pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir nges pa smos pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the word ‚Äúascertainment‚Äù is used.

original: 'o na gal te nges pa'i don thob par byed pa nyid tshad ma ma yin na ni de lta na ni 'o na rgyu 'ga' zhig las spang bar bya ba dang blang bar bya ba'i don la ma zhugs sam /
analyzed: 'o na gal te nges pa'i don thob par byed pa nyid tshad ma ma yin na ni de lta na ni 'o na rgyu 'ga' zhig las spang bar bya ba dang blang bar bya ba'i don la ma zhugs sam /
translated: If right cognition does not obtain the meaning of a text, then how does one engage in the meaning to be adopted or rejected on the basis of some cause?

original: zhugs kyang 'gal ba'i rkyen nye bas thob par byed pa ma yin pa'i 'jug par byed pa tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: zhugs kyang 'gal ba'i rkyen nye bas thob par byed pa ma yin pa'i 'jug par byed pa tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if it is engaged in, it is not a valid cognition that causes the attainment of the object, because it is engaged in by the power of the proximity of the contradictory condition.

original: de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te /
translated: That is not correct.

original: gang gi phyir shes pas skyes bu mi 'dod kyang /
analyzed: gang gi phyir shes pas skyes bu mi 'dod kyang /
translated: Because even though the person does not desire knowledge,

original: gal te gzhug par bya ba 'am /
analyzed: gal te gzhug par bya ba 'am /
translated: if it is to be engaged in,

original: 'gal ba'i rkyen nye ba yang spang bar bya ba ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'gal ba'i rkyen nye ba yang spang bar bya ba ni ma yin gyi /
translated: or if the contradictory condition is proximate, it is not to be abandoned.

original: 'on kyang 'jug pa'i yul nye bar bstan par bya ba 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'jug pa'i yul nye bar bstan par bya ba 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
translated: But it is only the object of engagement that is to be presented.

original: de tsam gyis ni de tshad ma ma yin no zhes brjod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de tsam gyis ni de tshad ma ma yin no zhes brjod pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not said that it is not a valid cognition merely by that.

original: don thob pa ni phyis kyi don la dmigs pa'i shes pa'i bdag nyid yin na /
analyzed: don thob pa ni phyis kyi don la dmigs pa'i shes pa'i bdag nyid yin na /
translated: If the attainment of the object is the nature of the subsequent consciousness that observes the object,

original: gzhan ni gzhan gyi rang rang bzhin du 'gyur bar mi 'os te /
analyzed: gzhan ni gzhan gyi rang rang bzhin du 'gyur bar mi 'os te /
translated: it would not be suitable for one thing to be the nature of another,

original: ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because that would lead to an absurd consequence.

original: des na zhig par gyur ba gang zhig thob par byed pa po gang zhig yin pa de yang /
analyzed: des na zhig par gyur ba gang zhig thob par byed pa po gang zhig yin pa de yang /
translated: Therefore, what is the agent that causes the attainment of that which has disintegrated?

original: dus phyis thob pa'i rang bzhin ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dus phyis thob pa'i rang bzhin ni ma yin no //
translated: That also is not the nature of the subsequent attainment.

original: des na thob par byed pa'i nus pa'i don thob par byed pa po'i tshad ma nyid ni shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: des na thob par byed pa'i nus pa'i don thob par byed pa po'i tshad ma nyid ni shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin par blta bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the valid cognition that is the agent of obtaining the object should be seen as the nature of consciousness itself.

original: don thob pa'i nus pa de yang rgyu mtshan med pa can du ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: don thob pa'i nus pa de yang rgyu mtshan med pa can du ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, that capacity to obtain the object cannot be causeless,

original: thams cad kyang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad kyang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because that would lead to everything being possible.

original: phyis kyi thob pa'i shes pas byas pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: phyis kyi thob pa'i shes pas byas pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it produced by a subsequent cognition of obtaining,

original: gang gi phyir nus pa ni rang bzhin las tha dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir nus pa ni rang bzhin las tha dad pa ma yin no //
translated: because the capacity is not different from the nature.

original: rgyu yang brtags na thob par bya ba'i don de nyid yin te /
analyzed: rgyu yang brtags na thob par bya ba'i don de nyid yin te /
translated: Moreover, when the cause is examined, it is that very object to be obtained,

original: gang gis de las skyes pa de'i phyir na nges par de thob par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gis de las skyes pa de'i phyir na nges par de thob par byed pa yin no //
translated: because that which arises from it is ascertained to be the agent of obtaining it.

original: yang gang zhig zhen par byas pa'i don las ma skyes pa de ni de dang ma 'brel ba'i phyir thob par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yang gang zhig zhen par byas pa'i don las ma skyes pa de ni de dang ma 'brel ba'i phyir thob par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, that which does not arise from the object that is clung to is not related to it, and therefore it is not the agent of obtaining it.

original: de las skyes pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi de thob pa'i nus pa de ni gang gis 'jug par byed pa ma yin pa de la yang dgag pa med pas na de yang tshad ma nyid do //
analyzed: de las skyes pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi de thob pa'i nus pa de ni gang gis 'jug par byed pa ma yin pa de la yang dgag pa med pas na de yang tshad ma nyid do //
translated: The capacity to obtain that which is produced from that is not what causes engagement. Since there is no negation of that, it is also a valid cognition.

original: gal te de ma thag pa'i rgyu nyid nus pa yin pa de lta na yang dngos po gzhan bzlog pa la phyogs pa'i ngag la /
analyzed: gal te de ma thag pa'i rgyu nyid nus pa yin pa de lta na yang dngos po gzhan bzlog pa la phyogs pa'i ngag la /
translated: Even if the cause of the immediately preceding condition is a capacity, in a statement that is directed toward the reversal of another entity,

original: 'di nyid lhan cig byed pa dag gis bogs phyung bas nus pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di nyid lhan cig byed pa dag gis bogs phyung bas nus pa yin gyi /
translated: this is a capacity that is enhanced by the cooperating conditions.üîΩIt is not a pot.

original: bum pa ni ma yin no @218b zhes sbyang nang na gnas pa'i sa bon myu gu'i rgyu yin par brjod pa de bzhin du log pa'i shes pa'i 'jug pa ni brgyud pas kyang nus pa med par bstan pa'i phyir brgyud pas thob par byed pa po yang dag
analyzed: bum pa ni ma yin no @218b zhes sbyang nang na gnas pa'i sa bon myu gu'i rgyu yin par brjod pa de bzhin du log pa'i shes pa'i 'jug pa ni brgyud pas kyang nus pa med par bstan pa'i phyir brgyud pas thob par byed pa po yang dag
translated: Just as the seed that is located in the husk is said to be the cause of the sprout, in the same way, the engagement of a mistaken consciousness is shown to be without capacity, even indirectly. Therefore, the one who obtains it indirectly is

original: pa'i shes pa nyid yin par brjod do //
analyzed: pa'i shes pa nyid yin par brjod do //
translated: said to be a correct consciousness.

original: gang gi phyir don du gnyer bar 'dod pa la 'jug par byed pa de ni 'dir 'thob par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir don du gnyer bar 'dod pa la 'jug par byed pa de ni 'dir 'thob par byed pa yin la /
translated: Because it causes engagement for one who desires to pursue an object, it is what causes obtainment here.

original: gzhan ni rnam par dpyad nas rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: gzhan ni rnam par dpyad nas rnam par gzhag go //
translated: The other is posited through analysis.

original: don byed par snang ba'i shes pa las bsams pa'i don grub pa ni 'ga' yang 'jug pa med de /
analyzed: don byed par snang ba'i shes pa las bsams pa'i don grub pa ni 'ga' yang 'jug pa med de /
translated: There is no engagement of any sort of cognition that appears to perform a function in the accomplishment of the intended purpose,

original: gang gi phyir de nyid dgos par 'dod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de nyid dgos par 'dod pa yin gyi /
translated: because that itself is held to be the purpose.

original: thob par bya ba gzhan ni yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: thob par bya ba gzhan ni yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: There is no other purpose to be attained.

original: shes pa de 'ang skad cig ma ni tshu rol mthong bas dpyad par 'os pa ma yin no //
analyzed: shes pa de 'ang skad cig ma ni tshu rol mthong bas dpyad par 'os pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, that cognition is not fit to be analyzed by the momentary seeing of the present.

original: lhag mar gyur pas 'di dpyod par byed pa ni 'jug par byed pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: lhag mar gyur pas 'di dpyod par byed pa ni 'jug par byed pa nyid yin no //
translated: The one who analyzes this, remaining as an observer, is the one who engages.

original: de nyid brgyud pas ma nges par rgyur gnas pa'i phyir de nyid ni tshad ma yin te gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid brgyud pas ma nges par rgyur gnas pa'i phyir de nyid ni tshad ma yin te gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since that very [cognition] remains as the cause of the uncertain continuity, that very [cognition] is the valid cognition, because there is no other.

original: ci ste de las skyes pas byas pa'i de thob par nus pa ji ltar nges par bzung zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste de las skyes pas byas pa'i de thob par nus pa ji ltar nges par bzung zhe na /
translated: If it is asked how it is ascertained that the ability to attain that is made by arising from that,

original: re zhig rjes su dpag pa dang don byed pa'i shes pa'i mngon sum ni rang bzhin mthong ba nyid las so //
analyzed: re zhig rjes su dpag pa dang don byed pa'i shes pa'i mngon sum ni rang bzhin mthong ba nyid las so //
translated: the inference and the direct perception of the cognition of function are from seeing the nature itself.

original: gang gi phyir yod pa ni don byed par nus pa nyid yin pas de bzung na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir yod pa ni don byed par nus pa nyid yin pas de bzung na /
translated: Because that which exists is only able to perform a function.üîΩ

original: don du gnyer bar bya ba'i dngos po gzhan ci yod de /
analyzed: don du gnyer bar bya ba'i dngos po gzhan ci yod de /
translated: Because an existent is only that which is able to perform a function, if it is apprehended, what other thing that is sought is there?

original: de'i phyir de ni rang kho nas don yod par nges pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ni rang kho nas don yod par nges pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is ascertained that it alone is the existent object.

original: yang don byed pa med par dngos po 'dzin pa'i mngon sum bdag nyid kyi yul bsgrub par bya bas don du gnyer ba yul la 'jug par byed pa gang yin pa de ni cung zad ni gzhan las tshad ma yin te /
analyzed: yang don byed pa med par dngos po 'dzin pa'i mngon sum bdag nyid kyi yul bsgrub par bya bas don du gnyer ba yul la 'jug par byed pa gang yin pa de ni cung zad ni gzhan las tshad ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, when the object of a direct perception that apprehends an existent thing is established without performing a function, the one who seeks it engages in the object.

original: gang zhig dngos po 'dzin pa nyid du ni nges la khyad par 'dzin pa nyid du ma yin no //üîΩdper na thag ring po nas dmar lam me ba'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa skyes pas na ci 'di pa la sha'i me tog gi dog pa'i tshogs sam /
analyzed: gang zhig dngos po 'dzin pa nyid du ni nges la khyad par 'dzin pa nyid du ma yin no // dper na thag ring po nas dmar lam me ba'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa skyes pas na ci 'di pa la sha'i me tog gi dog pa'i tshogs sam /
translated: That is a valid cognition in some cases with regard to another, but not in all cases.

original: 'on te me'i phung po bzhin zhes khyad par la the tshom za yang /
analyzed: 'on te me'i phung po bzhin zhes khyad par la the tshom za yang /
translated: For example, when a consciousness that has the aspect of a mere red extension is produced from a distance, one wonders about the particulars: ‚ÄúIs this a mass of coral flowers or a mass of fire?‚Äù

original: dmar lam me ba'i rang bzhin gzung bar nges la /
analyzed: dmar lam me ba'i rang bzhin gzung bar nges la /
translated: But it is ascertained that the nature of a mere red extension is apprehended.

original: khyad par gzung ba nyid du ni ma yin pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: khyad par gzung ba nyid du ni ma yin pa lta bu'o //
translated: but not as the object.

original: dmar lam me ba tsam la ni dngos por 'dzin pa nges pa dang 'jug par byed pa yang yin no //
analyzed: dmar lam me ba tsam la ni dngos por 'dzin pa nges pa dang 'jug par byed pa yang yin no //
translated: But when it is merely red, it is both a determiner and an inducer of the apprehension of the thing.

original: khyad par la nges pa ni du ba la sogs pa'i 'brel bar mthong ba @219a * //
analyzed: khyad par la nges pa ni du ba la sogs pa'i 'brel bar mthong ba @219a * //
translated: The determination of the particular is from seeing the connection of smoke, etc.

original: las sam / drung na 'dug pa'i mngon sum nyid kyis yin no //
analyzed: las sam / drung na 'dug pa'i mngon sum nyid kyis yin no //
translated: or from the perception of one who is present.

original: yul de la thob par byed pa ni snga ma de nyid yin par 'dod do //
analyzed: yul de la thob par byed pa ni snga ma de nyid yin par 'dod do //
translated: The attainment of the object is held to be the same as the former.

original: 'di ltar rjes su dpog pa ni med na mi 'byung ba dang ldan pa nges pa las dngos po nges par byed pa'i tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar rjes su dpog pa ni med na mi 'byung ba dang ldan pa nges pa las dngos po nges par byed pa'i tshad ma yin no //
translated: Thus, inference is a valid means of knowledge that determines the thing from the determination of the invariable concomitance.

original: mngon sum ni bzung ba'i rnam pa nges par byed pa las yin gyi //
analyzed: mngon sum ni bzung ba'i rnam pa nges par byed pa las yin gyi //
translated: Perception is from the determination of the apprehended aspect,

original: med na mi 'byung ba mthong ba las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba mthong ba las ni ma yin no //
translated: but not from seeing the invariable concomitance.

original: 'dir ni don byed pa la nye bar mkho ba'i dmar lam me ba gang yin pa de nyid kyi yul dang dus dang rnam pa nges pa shes pa snga ma de la snang bar rnam par gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ni don byed pa la nye bar mkho ba'i dmar lam me ba gang yin pa de nyid kyi yul dang dus dang rnam pa nges pa shes pa snga ma de la snang bar rnam par gnas pa yin te /
translated: Here, the object, time, and aspect of that which is clearly manifest, which is necessary for the performance of an action, is present in the prior cognition.

original: gzhan du na dngos po de'i yul la brten pa'i the tshom nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na dngos po de'i yul la brten pa'i the tshom nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, doubt would not be based on the object of that thing.

original: de tsam gyis kyang dngos po la mngon sum gyi bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de tsam gyis kyang dngos po la mngon sum gyi bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
translated: And that much is the complete performance of the function of perception with regard to the thing.

original: de la phyis rgyu kha cig las mthong zhing nges pa'i don med na mi 'byung bar the tshom za zhing /
analyzed: de la phyis rgyu kha cig las mthong zhing nges pa'i don med na mi 'byung bar the tshom za zhing /
translated: Later, with regard to that, if one doubts whether or not a certain cause is necessary for the perception and ascertainment of the object,

original: dngos po la yang reg par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: dngos po la yang reg par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: one touches the thing.

original: de nges par 'gyur na ni mthong zhing nges pa'i dngos po the tshom yang mi gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nges par 'gyur na ni mthong zhing nges pa'i dngos po the tshom yang mi gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one is certain, then doubt does not persist with regard to the perceived and ascertained thing.

original: de'i phyir shes pa gzhan las ni shes pa'i bdag nyid kyi med na mi 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid tshad ma de nyid sngar ma nges pa nges par bya ba yin gyi //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes pa gzhan las ni shes pa'i bdag nyid kyi med na mi 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid tshad ma de nyid sngar ma nges pa nges par bya ba yin gyi //
translated: Therefore, the validity of that cognition, which is characterized by the invariable concomitance of the nature of cognition, is to be ascertained from another cognition, and not from an object.

original: dngos po ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po ni ma yin no //
translated: The object is not.

original: sngar gyi mthong ba'i 'du byed ma nyams pa de la zhen par byed pa zhen pa ni dran pa yin no //
analyzed: sngar gyi mthong ba'i 'du byed ma nyams pa de la zhen par byed pa zhen pa ni dran pa yin no //
translated: The recollection of the object is the adherence to the object that was previously seen and not lost.

original: dngos po tha dad pa 'dzin na ni rang gi yul la tshad ma nyid de /
analyzed: dngos po tha dad pa 'dzin na ni rang gi yul la tshad ma nyid de /
translated: If it grasps a different object, it is valid in regard to its own object,

original: dper na lhan cig spyod pa'i reg pa 'dzin pa bzhin no //üîΩgang gis 'dzin par byed pa nyid la /
analyzed: dper na lhan cig spyod pa'i reg pa 'dzin pa bzhin no // gang gis 'dzin par byed pa nyid la /
translated: like the grasping of the simultaneous contact.

original: med na mi 'byung bar the tshom za bar gzhan la nges par bya bar 'gyur ba skad cig ma nyid ni de ltar bzung zhing nges pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: med na mi 'byung bar the tshom za bar gzhan la nges par bya bar 'gyur ba skad cig ma nyid ni de ltar bzung zhing nges pa ma yin gyi /
translated: But the momentariness of that object is not grasped and ascertained in the same way that the grasping itself is ascertained in regard to another object,

original: 'on kyang dngos po de nyid shes par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang dngos po de nyid shes par bya ba yin no //
translated: but rather that object itself is to be cognized.

original: de'i phyir ji ltar smig rgyu la chur sgro btags par med par ma nges pa'i phyir de'i rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i shes pa de la tshad ma ma yin pa de bzhin skad cig ma nyid dam /
analyzed: de'i phyir ji ltar smig rgyu la chur sgro btags par med par ma nges pa'i phyir de'i rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i shes pa de la tshad ma ma yin pa de bzhin skad cig ma nyid dam /
translated: Therefore, just as a cognition apprehending the intrinsic identity of a mirage is not a valid cognition because it is not ascertained as non-deceptive with respect to water, which is superimposed upon the mirage,

original: gzhan ni rjes dpag par bya ba yin gyi mngon sum ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni rjes dpag par bya ba yin gyi mngon sum ni ma yin no //
translated: the momentariness of things is to be inferred, not directly perceived.

original: gal te bar du nges par byed pa'i shes pa gzhan ma byung na ni don byed pa'i shes pa las kyang yin no //
analyzed: gal te bar du nges par byed pa'i shes pa gzhan ma byung na ni don byed pa'i shes pa las kyang yin no //
translated: If there is no other cognition in between that ascertains the object, then it is also from a cognition that performs a function.

original: des na ji ltar bden pa'i khyad par la gzhan las tshad ma yin pa de bzhin du dngos po tsam du 'dzin pa yang yul gyi khyad par la ltos nas de kho na ltar tshad mar nges pa yin no //
analyzed: des na ji ltar bden pa'i khyad par la gzhan las tshad ma yin pa de bzhin du dngos po tsam du 'dzin pa yang yul gyi khyad par la ltos nas de kho na ltar tshad mar nges pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, just as a cognition is a valid cognition with respect to a particular truth, in the same way, a cognition apprehending mere entity is ascertained as a valid cognition with respect to that alone, depending on the particular object.

original: @219b khyad par nyid du the tshom za ba rnam pa gnyis gang yin ba de yang gzhan las de'i rang bzhin nges par byed de /
analyzed: @219b khyad par nyid du the tshom za ba rnam pa gnyis gang yin ba de yang gzhan las de'i rang bzhin nges par byed de /
translated: The two types of doubt with respect to a particularity are also ascertained as the nature of that by another cognition.

original: dper na me ra snang ba'i shes pa 'dir bdag la skyes par tshor na ci skyes sam zhes bya ba dang / yang na gang gi tshe mer snang ba'i shes pa nyams su myong ba the tshom yang mi za'i /
analyzed: dper na me ra snang ba'i shes pa 'dir bdag la skyes par tshor na ci skyes sam zhes bya ba dang / yang na gang gi tshe mer snang ba'i shes pa nyams su myong ba the tshom yang mi za'i /
translated: Or, when one experiences the cognition appearing as fire without any doubt,

original: ci 'di don med pa can yin nam snyam pa de'i tshe 'jug pa'i yul ni thams cad du snang ba nyid yin la /
analyzed: ci 'di don med pa can yin nam snyam pa de'i tshe 'jug pa'i yul ni thams cad du snang ba nyid yin la /
translated: at that time, the appearing object is the engaged object in all cases.

original: 'jug pa'i yul rnam par 'jog pa yin pa na tshad ma yang snga ma nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i yul rnam par 'jog pa yin pa na tshad ma yang snga ma nyid yin no //
translated: When the engaged object is determined, the valid cognition is the former one.

original: 'ga' zhig ni rang nyid kho na las tshad ma yin te /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig ni rang nyid kho na las tshad ma yin te /
translated: Some are valid cognitions by themselves alone.

original: 'brel ba can gyi khyad par du 'gyur ba'i dngos po 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: 'brel ba can gyi khyad par du 'gyur ba'i dngos po 'dzin pa'o //
translated: They apprehend the thing that becomes the specific related object.

original: gang gi phyir 'khrul ba'i shes pa ni yul dang dus dang gsal byed dang / rgyu nges pa dang ldan par skye ba yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'khrul ba'i shes pa ni yul dang dus dang gsal byed dang / rgyu nges pa dang ldan par skye ba yin te /
translated: Because a mistaken cognition arises with a definite object, time, illuminator, and cause.

original: mya ngam dang chung ngu la chen por 'khrul ba dang / thag ring na 'dres par snang ngo //
analyzed: mya ngam dang chung ngu la chen por 'khrul ba dang / thag ring na 'dres par snang ngo //
translated: In a desert, a small thing is mistaken for a large thing, and in the distance, a mixed appearance is seen.

original: nyi ma gung la tshad pas nyams pa shes pa'i mi gsal ba'i phyir smig rgyu la chur nges pa dang / mar mes gsal bar byas pa na autpala sngon po la sogs la dmar po 'dzin pa dang / rab rib kyis nye bar bslad pas zla ba gnyis su 'dzin pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: nyi ma gung la tshad pas nyams pa shes pa'i mi gsal ba'i phyir smig rgyu la chur nges pa dang / mar mes gsal bar byas pa na autpala sngon po la sogs la dmar po 'dzin pa dang / rab rib kyis nye bar bslad pas zla ba gnyis su 'dzin pa lta bu ste /
translated: Because the sun at noon is impaired by heat, the cognition is unclear, and so one ascertains a mirage to be water. Because a blue lotus, etc. is illuminated by a lamp, one apprehends it as red. Because one is affected by cataracts, one apprehends two moons.

original: 'khrul pa 'di thams cad ni dngos po nges pas bskyed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'khrul pa 'di thams cad ni dngos po nges pas bskyed pa yin no //
translated: All these errors are generated by the ascertainment of an entity.

original: de'i phyir yul nye ba dang / dus kyi khyad par can dang / gsal byed khyad par can dang / dbang po ma nyams pa dang / bdag nyid gnyid la sogs pas ma gdungs pas yul nges pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs can gyi 'dzin par byed pa dang ldan pa'i dngos po mthong ba las nas 'dzin par byed pa don mi 'byung bar shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir yul nye ba dang / dus kyi khyad par can dang / gsal byed khyad par can dang / dbang po ma nyams pa dang / bdag nyid gnyid la sogs pas ma gdungs pas yul nges pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs can gyi 'dzin par byed pa dang ldan pa'i dngos po mthong ba las nas 'dzin par byed pa don mi 'byung bar shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, one should understand that the apprehension of an entity that has the condition of ascertaining an object, etc., does not occur from seeing an object that is near, that has a particular time, that has a particular illuminator, that has unimpaired sense faculties, and that is not tormented by sleepiness, etc. on one‚Äôs part.

original: 'di ltar de lta bur gyur pa'i rnam par shes pa lan cig ma yin par don 'dzin pa nyams su myong ba'i tha snyad goms pa las de'i rang bzhin rig par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar de lta bur gyur pa'i rnam par shes pa lan cig ma yin par don 'dzin pa nyams su myong ba'i tha snyad goms pa las de'i rang bzhin rig par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Thus, the nature of consciousness is known from the experience of the repeated apprehension of objects.

original: rtogs par byed pa po nyams su myong ba kho nas de'i bdag nyid nges par byed do //
analyzed: rtogs par byed pa po nyams su myong ba kho nas de'i bdag nyid nges par byed do //
translated: The cognizer ascertains the nature of consciousness by experience alone.

original: gang yang rnam par mtshungs pa'i phyir skyes pa'i dus su ni mngon sum dang der snang ba dag la tha dad pa yod pa ma yin no zhes zer ba de ni mi bden te /

original: bden pa dang mi bden pa dag gcig car 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: khyad par la the tshom za ba ni thag ring po'i yul can ni rtag tu gzhan las sos //

analyzed: khyad par bzung ba nyid du the tshom za ba rnam pa gnyis po gang yin pa de yang gzhan kho na las so //

analyzed: de'i phyir tshad ma gzhan las tshad ma yin gyis the tshom las 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
